77AIPlayer::AIPlayer( Player *p ) :
78m_player(p),
79m_buildDelay(0),
80m_teamDelay(0),
81m_teamTimer(2), // Important - don't start building teams until frame 1.
82m_structureTimer(2), // Important - don't start building structures until frame 1.
83m_readyToBuildTeam(false),
84m_readyToBuildStructure(false),
85m_structuresInQueue(0),
86m_repairDozer(INVALID_ID),
87m_skillsetSelector(INVALID_SKILLSET_SELECTION),
88m_dozerQueuedForRepair(false),
89m_supplySourceAttackCheckFrame(0),
90m_attackedSupplyCenter(INVALID_ID),
91m_teamSeconds(10),
92m_curWarehouseID(INVALID_ID)
93{
94 m_frameLastBuildingBuilt = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
95 p->setCanBuildUnits(false); // turn off ai production by default.
96
97 Int i;
98 for (i=0; i<MAX_STRUCTURES_TO_REPAIR; i++) {
99 m_structuresToRepair[i] = INVALID_ID;
100 }
101 m_repairDozerOrigin.zero();
102 m_baseCenter.zero();
103 m_baseCenterSet = false;
104 m_difficulty = TheScriptEngine->getGlobalDifficulty();
105 m_teamSeconds = TheAI->getAiData()->m_teamSeconds;
106}
107
108// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
109// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
110AIPlayer::~AIPlayer()
111{
112 clearTeamsInQueue();
113}

115// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
117// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
118void AIPlayer::onStructureProduced( Object *factory, Object *bldg )
119{
120 m_teamDelay = 0; // Cause the update queues & selection to happen immediately.
121 m_buildDelay = 0; // Cause
122 /* Find the info building this. */
123 BuildListInfo *info;
124 for( info = m_player->getBuildList(); info; info = info->getNext() )
125 {
126 if (info->getObjectID() != bldg->getID()) continue;
127 Dict d;
128 d.setAsciiString(TheKey_objectName, info->getBuildingName());
129 d.setAsciiString(TheKey_objectScriptAttachment, info->getScript());
130 d.setInt(TheKey_objectInitialHealth, info->getHealth());
131 d.setBool(TheKey_objectUnsellable, info->getUnsellable());
132
133 info->setUnderConstruction(false);
134 bldg->updateObjValuesFromMapProperties(&d);
135 // clear the under construction status
136 bldg->clearStatus( MAKE_OBJECT_STATUS_MASK2( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION, OBJECT_STATUS_RECONSTRUCTING ) );
137
138 // UnderConstruction just cleared, so update our upgrades
139 bldg->updateUpgradeModules();
140
141 TheScriptEngine->addObjectToCache(bldg);
142 TheScriptEngine->runObjectScript(info->getScript(), bldg);
143 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugAI) {
144 AsciiString bldgName = bldg->getTemplate()->getName();
145 bldgName.concat(" - Building completed.");
146 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(bldgName, false);
147 }
148 checkForSupplyCenter(info, bldg);
149 return;
150 }
151
152 // Look in build list & see if this is spawned from a hole.
153 for( info = m_player->getBuildList(); info; info = info->getNext() )
154 {
155 const ThingTemplate *bldgPlan = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( info->getTemplateName() );
156 if (!bldgPlan) {
157 continue;
158 }
159 if (!bldgPlan->isEquivalentTo(bldg->getTemplate())) {
160 continue; // not the same kind of building we're looking for.
161 }
162 // check for hole.
163 if (info->getObjectID() != INVALID_ID) {
164 // used to have a building.
165 Object *obj = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID( info->getObjectID() );
166 if (obj!=NULL) {
167 if (obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_REBUILD_HOLE)) {
168 RebuildHoleBehaviorInterface *rhbi = RebuildHoleBehavior::getRebuildHoleBehaviorInterfaceFromObject( obj );
169 if( rhbi ) {
170 ObjectID spawnedID = rhbi->getReconstructedBuildingID();
171 if (bldg->getID() == spawnedID) {
172 DEBUG_LOG(("AI got rebuilt %s\n", bldgPlan->getName().str()));
173 info->setObjectID(bldg->getID());
174 return;
175 }
176 }
177 }
178 }
179 }
180 }
181
182 if (TheGameLogic->getFrame()>0) {
183 DEBUG_LOG(("***AI PLAYER-Structure not found in production queue.\n"));
184 }
185}
186
187// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
189// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
190void AIPlayer::checkForSupplyCenter( BuildListInfo *info, Object *bldg )
191{
192 class SupplyCenterDockUpdate;
193 // if it is a supply center, I must have boxes
194 static const NameKeyType key_centerUpdate = NAMEKEY("SupplyCenterDockUpdate");
195 SupplyCenterDockUpdate *centerModule = (SupplyCenterDockUpdate*)bldg->findUpdateModule( key_centerUpdate );
196 if( centerModule )
197 {
198 info->setSupplyBuilding(true);
199 Int desiredGatherers = 0;
200 const AISideInfo *resInfo = TheAI->getAiData()->m_sideInfo;
201 while (resInfo) {
202 if (resInfo->m_side == m_player->getSide()) {
203 GameDifficulty difficulty = m_difficulty;
204 if (difficulty == DIFFICULTY_EASY) {
205 desiredGatherers = resInfo->m_easy;
206 }
207 if (difficulty == DIFFICULTY_NORMAL) {
208 desiredGatherers = resInfo->m_normal;
209 }
210 if (difficulty == DIFFICULTY_HARD) {
211 desiredGatherers = resInfo->m_hard;
212 }
213 }
214 resInfo = resInfo->m_next;
215 }
216 info->setSupplyBuilding(true);
217 info->setCurrentGatherers(-1);
218 info->setDesiredGatherers(desiredGatherers+1); // get a freebie with the supply depots.
219 }
220}
221
222// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
224// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
225void AIPlayer::queueSupplyTruck( void )
226{
227 Bool truckInQueue = false;
228 for ( DLINK_ITERATOR<TeamInQueue> iter = iterate_TeamBuildQueue(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
229 {
230 TeamInQueue *team = iter.cur();
231 WorkOrder *order;
232 for( order = team->m_workOrders; order; order = order->m_next )
233 {
234 // GLA dozers (workers) are also resource gatherers, so make sure it isn't a worker. jba.
235 if (order->m_isResourceGatherer) {
236 truckInQueue = true;
237 }
238 }
239 }
240
241 if (truckInQueue) {
242 return; // already building a supply truck.
243 }
244 Int totalHarvesters = 0;
245
246 // See how many harvesters we have servicing this supply src.
247 // Scan my units.
248 Player::PlayerTeamList::const_iterator it;
249 for (it = m_player->getPlayerTeams()->begin(); it != m_player->getPlayerTeams()->end(); ++it) {
250 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
251 Team *team = iter.cur();
252 if (!team) {
253 continue;
254 }
255 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> objIter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !objIter.done(); objIter.advance()) {
256 Object *obj = objIter.cur();
257 if (!obj) continue;
258 if (!obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_HARVESTER)) continue;
259 if (!obj->getAI()) continue;
260
261 SupplyTruckAIInterface* supplyTruckAI = obj->getAI()->getSupplyTruckAIInterface();
262 if( supplyTruckAI ) {
263 totalHarvesters++;
264 }
265 }
266 }
267 }
268
269 /* Find the info building this. */
270 for( BuildListInfo *info = m_player->getBuildList(); info; info = info->getNext() )
271 {
272 if (info->isSupplyBuilding() == false) continue;
273 Int desiredGatherers = info->getDesiredGatherers();
274 Int curGatherers = info->getCurrentGatherers();
275
276 if (curGatherers>=desiredGatherers) {
277 // Check & see if any have died.
278 Object *supplyCenter = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(info->getObjectID());
279 // Check for supplies.
280 if (supplyCenter) {
281 if (supplyCenter->isKindOf(KINDOF_REBUILD_HOLE)) {
282 continue; // don't consider rebuild holes.
283 }
284 // Make sure we have a supplies near it.
285 Coord3D center = *supplyCenter->getPosition();
286 Real radius = SUPPLY_CENTER_CLOSE_DIST + supplyCenter->getGeometryInfo().getBoundingCircleRadius();
287
288 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf f1(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(KINDOF_SUPPLY_SOURCE), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
289 PartitionFilterPlayer f2(m_player, false); // Only find other.
290 PartitionFilterOnMap filterMapStatus;
291
292 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, &f2, &filterMapStatus, 0 };
293
294 Object *supplySource = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject(&center, radius, FROM_BOUNDINGSPHERE_2D, filters);
295 if (!supplySource) {
296 // No supplies.
297 continue;
298 }
299 static const NameKeyType key_warehouseUpdate = NAMEKEY("SupplyWarehouseDockUpdate");
300 SupplyWarehouseDockUpdate *warehouseModule = (SupplyWarehouseDockUpdate*)supplySource->findUpdateModule( key_warehouseUpdate );
301 if( warehouseModule ) {
302 Int availableCash = warehouseModule->getBoxesStored()*TheGlobalData->m_baseValuePerSupplyBox;
303 if (availableCash<=0) continue;
304 if( m_player->getRelationship(supplySource->getTeam()) == ENEMIES ) {
305 continue;
306 }
307 }
308 // Ok, it has supplies available near it.
309 checkForSupplyCenter(info, supplyCenter);
310 Int curGatherers = 0;
311 // See how many harvesters we have servicing this supply src.
312 // Scan my units.
313 Player::PlayerTeamList::const_iterator it;
314 for (it = m_player->getPlayerTeams()->begin(); it != m_player->getPlayerTeams()->end(); ++it) {
315 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
316 Team *team = iter.cur();
317 if (!team) {
318 continue;
319 }
320 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> objIter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !objIter.done(); objIter.advance()) {
321 Object *obj = objIter.cur();
322 if (!obj) continue;
323 if (!obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_HARVESTER)) continue;
324 if (!obj->getAI()) continue;
325
326 SupplyTruckAIInterface* supplyTruckAI = obj->getAI()->getSupplyTruckAIInterface();
327 if( supplyTruckAI ) {
328 ObjectID dock = supplyTruckAI->getPreferredDockID();
329 if (dock == supplyCenter->getID()) {
330 curGatherers++;
331 if (!supplyTruckAI->isCurrentlyFerryingSupplies()) {
332 // Note - although this is the ai, we are sending in CMD_FROM_PLAYER.
333 // This causes the dock object to stick in the docking interface.
334 // The supply truck ai issues dock commands, and they become confused.
335 // Thus, player. jba. ;(
336 obj->getAI()->aiDock(supplyCenter, CMD_FROM_PLAYER);
337 }
338 }
339 }
340 }
341 }
342 }
343 //DEBUG_LOG(("Expected %d harvesters, found %d, need %d\n", info->getDesiredGatherers(),
344 // curGatherers, info->getDesiredGatherers()-curGatherers) );
345 info->setCurrentGatherers(curGatherers);
346 }
347 } else {
348 /* See if we have any "loose" harvesters (cause my supply center got nuked.) */
349 Player::PlayerTeamList::const_iterator it;
350 for (it = m_player->getPlayerTeams()->begin(); it != m_player->getPlayerTeams()->end(); ++it) {
351 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
352 Team *team = iter.cur();
353 if (!team) continue;
354 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> objIter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !objIter.done(); objIter.advance()) {
355 Object *obj = objIter.cur();
356 if (!obj) continue;
357 if (!obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_HARVESTER)) continue;
358 if (!obj->getAI()) continue;
359
360 SupplyTruckAIInterface* supplyTruckAI = obj->getAI()->getSupplyTruckAIInterface();
361 if( supplyTruckAI ) {
362 ObjectID dock = supplyTruckAI->getPreferredDockID();
363 if (TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(dock)!=NULL) continue;
364 if (supplyTruckAI->isCurrentlyFerryingSupplies() || supplyTruckAI->isForcedIntoWantingState())
365 {
366 // This thinks he is a gatherer, but doesn't have a preferred dock id.
367 Object *center = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(info->getObjectID());
368 if (center) {
369 info->setCurrentGatherers(info->getCurrentGatherers()+1);
370 // Note - although this is the ai, we are sending in CMD_FROM_PLAYER.
371 // This causes the dock object to stick in the docking interface.
372 // The supply truck ai issues dock commands, and they become confused.
373 // Thus, player. jba. ;(
374 obj->getAI()->aiDock(center, CMD_FROM_PLAYER);
375 DEBUG_LOG(("Re-attaching supply truck to supply center.\n"));
376 return;
377 }
378 }
379 }
380 }
381 }
382 }
383 if (totalHarvesters >= desiredGatherers*3) {
384 continue; // we got lotsa gatherers.
385 }
386 Bool canBuildUnits = m_player->getCanBuildUnits();
387 // If we need a supply truck thingy, turn on unit building for a moment.
388 m_player->setCanBuildUnits(true);
389 const ThingTemplate *tTemplate = TheThingFactory->firstTemplate();
390 while (tTemplate) {
391 Bool isSupplyTruck = tTemplate->isKindOf(KINDOF_HARVESTER);;
392 if (isSupplyTruck) {
393 Object *factory = findFactory(tTemplate, false);
394 if (factory) {
395 // we can build one.
396 WorkOrder *order = newInstance(WorkOrder);
397 order->m_thing = tTemplate;
398 order->m_factoryID = INVALID_ID;
399 order->m_numRequired = 1;
400 order->m_required = true;
401 order->m_isResourceGatherer =true;
402 // prepend to head of list
403 order->m_next = NULL;
404 TeamInQueue *team = newInstance(TeamInQueue);
405 // Put in front of queue.
406 prependTo_TeamBuildQueue(team);
407 team->m_priorityBuild = true;
408 team->m_workOrders = order;
409 team->m_frameStarted = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
410 // Stick it on the default team
411 team->m_team = m_player->getDefaultTeam();
412 AsciiString teamName = "Supply truck - building one at the ";
413 teamName.concat(factory->getTemplate()->getName());
414 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, false);
415 m_teamDelay = 0;
416 if (info->getCurrentGatherers()==-1) {
417 // First one is automatic. jba.
418 order->m_factoryID = factory->getID();
419 info->setCurrentGatherers(0);
420 } else {
421 startTraining( order, team->m_priorityBuild, team->m_team->getName());
422 }
423 break;
424 }
425 }
426 tTemplate = tTemplate->friend_getNextTemplate();
427 }
428 m_player->setCanBuildUnits(canBuildUnits);
429 }
430 }
431}

435static void deleteQueue(TeamInQueue* o)

437 if (o)
438 {
439 o->deleteInstance();
440 }

449 removeAll_TeamReadyQueue(deleteQueue);
450}

452// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
453// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
454Object *AIPlayer::buildStructureNow(const ThingTemplate *bldgPlan, BuildListInfo *info)
455{
456
457 // inst-construct the building
458 Object *bldg = TheBuildAssistant->buildObjectNow( NULL,
459 bldgPlan,
460 info->getLocation(),
461 info->getAngle(),
462 m_player );
463
464 // store the object with the build order
465 if (bldg)
466 {
467 Dict d;
468 d.setAsciiString(TheKey_objectName, info->getBuildingName());
469 d.setAsciiString(TheKey_objectScriptAttachment, info->getScript());
470 d.setInt(TheKey_objectInitialHealth, info->getHealth());
471 d.setBool(TheKey_objectUnsellable, info->getUnsellable());
472
473 bldg->updateObjValuesFromMapProperties(&d);
474
475 info->setObjectID( bldg->getID() );
476 info->setObjectTimestamp( TheGameLogic->getFrame()+1 ); // has to be non-zero, so just add 1.
477
478 // clear the under construction status
479 bldg->clearStatus( MAKE_OBJECT_STATUS_MASK2( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION, OBJECT_STATUS_RECONSTRUCTING ) );
480
481 // UnderConstruction just cleared, so update our upgrades
482 bldg->updateUpgradeModules();
483
484 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugAI) {
485 AsciiString bldgName = bldgPlan->getName();
486 bldgName.concat(" - Building completed.");
487 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(bldgName, false);
488 }
489 TheScriptEngine->addObjectToCache(bldg);
490 TheScriptEngine->runObjectScript(info->getScript(), bldg);
491 checkForSupplyCenter(info, bldg);
492 ExitInterface *exitInterface = bldg->getObjectExitInterface();
493 if( exitInterface )
494 {
495 Coord3D rallyPoint;
496 Bool gotOffset = false;
497 if (fabs(info->getRallyOffset()->x) > 1.0f || fabs(info->getRallyOffset()->y)>1.0f) {
498 gotOffset;
499 }
500 if (!exitInterface->getNaturalRallyPoint(rallyPoint)) {
501 rallyPoint = *info->getLocation();
502 }
503 if (gotOffset) {
504 rallyPoint.x += info->getRallyOffset()->x;
505 rallyPoint.y += info->getRallyOffset()->y;
506 exitInterface->setRallyPoint(&rallyPoint);
507 }
508 }
509 } // bldg built
510 return bldg;
511}
512
513// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
514// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
515Object *AIPlayer::buildStructureWithDozer(const ThingTemplate *bldgPlan, BuildListInfo *info)
516{
517 // Find a dozer.
518 Object *dozer = findDozer(info->getLocation());
519 if (dozer==NULL) {
520 return NULL;
521 }
522 // Check available funds.
523 Money *money = m_player->getMoney();
524 if (money->countMoney()<bldgPlan->calcCostToBuild(m_player)) {
525 return NULL;
526 }
527 // construct the building
528 Coord3D pos = *info->getLocation();
529 pos.z += TheTerrainLogic->getGroundHeight(pos.x, pos.y);
530 if( !dozer->getAIUpdateInterface() )
531 {
532 return NULL;
533 }
534 Real angle = info->getAngle();
535 if( TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &pos, bldgPlan, angle,
536 BuildAssistant::NO_ENEMY_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
537 dozer, m_player ) != LBC_OK ) {
538 // If there's enemy units or structures, don't build/rebuild.
539 TheTerrainVisual->removeAllBibs(); // isLocationLegalToBuild adds bib feedback, turn it off. jba.
540 return NULL;
541 }
542
543 // validate the the position to build at is valid
544 if( TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &pos, bldgPlan, angle,
545 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
546 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
547 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
548 dozer, m_player ) != LBC_OK ) {
549 // Warn.
550 AsciiString bldgName = bldgPlan->getName();
551 bldgName.concat(" - Dozer unable to place. Attempting to adjust position.");
552 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(bldgName, false);
553 // try to fix.
554 Real posOffset;
555 Bool valid = false;
556 // Wiggle it a little :)
557 Real limit = 10*PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F;
558 if (isSkirmishAI()) {
559 limit = 120*PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F;
560 }
561 Coord3D newPos = pos;
562 for (posOffset = 0; posOffset<limit; posOffset += 2*PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F) {
563 if (isSkirmishAI()) {
564 posOffset += 2*PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F;
565 }
566 Real offset = posOffset/2;
567 Real xPos, yPos;
568 yPos = pos.y-offset;
569 for (xPos = pos.x-offset; xPos <= pos.x+offset; xPos+=PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F) {
570 if (isSkirmishAI()) xPos += PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F;
571 newPos.x = xPos;
572 newPos.y = yPos;
573 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, bldgPlan, angle,
574 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
575 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
576 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
577 dozer, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
578 if (valid) break;
579 newPos.y = yPos+posOffset;
580 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, bldgPlan, angle,
581 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
582 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
583 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
584 dozer, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
585 }
586 if (valid) break;
587 xPos = pos.x-offset;
588 for (yPos = pos.y-offset; yPos <= pos.y+offset; yPos+=PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F) {
589 if (isSkirmishAI()) yPos += PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F;
590 newPos.x = xPos;
591 newPos.y = yPos;
592 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, bldgPlan, angle,
593 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
594 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
595 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
596 dozer, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
597 if (valid) break;
598 newPos.x = xPos+posOffset;
599 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, bldgPlan, angle,
600 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
601 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
602 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
603 dozer, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
604 }
605 if (valid) break;
606 }
607 if (valid) pos = newPos;
608 if (!valid) {
609 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &pos, bldgPlan, angle,
610 BuildAssistant::NO_ENEMY_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
611 dozer, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
612 if (!valid) {
613 return NULL;
614 }
615 }
616
617 }
618
619 TheTerrainVisual->removeAllBibs(); // isLocationLegalToBuild adds bib feedback, turn it off. jba.
620 if (!TheAI->pathfinder()->clientSafeQuickDoesPathExist(dozer->getAI()->getLocomotorSet(),
621 dozer->getPosition(), &pos)) {
622 AsciiString bldgName = bldgPlan->getName();
623 bldgName.concat(" - Dozer unable to reach building. Teleporting.");
624 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(bldgName, false);
625 dozer->setPosition(&pos);
626 }
627
628 Object *bldg = TheBuildAssistant->buildObjectNow( dozer,
629 bldgPlan,
630 &pos,
631 angle,
632 m_player );
633
634
635
636#if defined _DEBUG || defined _INTERNAL
637 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugAI == AI_DEBUG_PATHS)
638 {
639 extern void addIcon(const Coord3D *pos, Real width, Int numFramesDuration, RGBColor color);
640 RGBColor color;
641 color.blue = 0;
642 color.red = 1;
643 color.green = 0;
644 Coord3D myPos;
645 myPos = *dozer->getPosition();
646 myPos.z = TheTerrainLogic->getGroundHeight( myPos.x, myPos.y ) + 0.5f;
647 addIcon(&myPos, 2*PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F, 120, color);
648 myPos = pos;
649 myPos.z = TheTerrainLogic->getGroundHeight( myPos.x, myPos.y ) + 0.5f;
650 addIcon(&myPos, 2*PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F, 120, color);
651 Real dx, dy;
652 dx = dozer->getPosition()->x - pos.x;
653 dy = dozer->getPosition()->y - pos.y;
654
655 Int count = sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy)/(PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F/2);
656 if (count<2) count = 2;
657 Int i;
658 color.green = 1;
659 for (i=1; i<count; i++) {
660 myPos.x = dozer->getPosition()->x + (pos.x-dozer->getPosition()->x)*i/count;
661 myPos.y = dozer->getPosition()->y + (pos.y-dozer->getPosition()->y)*i/count;
662 myPos.z = TheTerrainLogic->getGroundHeight( myPos.x, myPos.y ) + 0.5f;
663 addIcon(&myPos, PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F/2, 120, color);
664
665 }
666 }
667#endif
668
669 // store the object with the build order
670 if (bldg)
671 {
672 ExitInterface *exitInterface = bldg->getObjectExitInterface();
673 if( exitInterface )
674 {
675 Coord3D rallyPoint;
676 Bool gotOffset = false;
677 if (fabs(info->getRallyOffset()->x) > 1.0f || fabs(info->getRallyOffset()->y)>1.0f) {
678 gotOffset;
679 }
680 if (!exitInterface->getNaturalRallyPoint(rallyPoint)) {
681 rallyPoint = *info->getLocation();
682 }
683 if (gotOffset) {
684 rallyPoint.x += info->getRallyOffset()->x;
685 rallyPoint.y += info->getRallyOffset()->y;
686 exitInterface->setRallyPoint(&rallyPoint);
687 }
688 }
689 info->setObjectID( bldg->getID() );
690 info->setObjectTimestamp( TheGameLogic->getFrame()+1 ); // Has to be non-zero, so add 1.
691 info->setUnderConstruction(true);
692
693 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugAI) {
694 AsciiString bldgName = bldgPlan->getName();
695 bldgName.concat(" - Building started.");
696 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(bldgName, false);
697 }
698 } // bldg built
699 TheTerrainVisual->removeAllBibs(); // isLocationLegalToBuild adds bib feedback, turn it off. jba.
700 return bldg;
701}
702
703// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
705// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
706void AIPlayer::processBaseBuilding( void )
707{
708 //
709 // Refresh base buildings. Scan through list, if a building is missing,
710 // rebuild it, unless it's rebuild count is zero.
711 //
712 if (m_readyToBuildStructure)
713 {
714
715 for( BuildListInfo *info = m_player->getBuildList(); info; info = info->getNext() )
716 {
717 AsciiString name = info->getTemplateName();
718 if (name.isEmpty()) continue;
719 const ThingTemplate *bldgPlan = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( name );
720 if (!bldgPlan) {
721 DEBUG_LOG(("*** ERROR - Build list building '%s' doesn't exist.\n", name.str()));
722 continue;
723 }
724 // check for hole.
725 if (info->getObjectID() != INVALID_ID) {
726 // used to have a building.
727 Object *bldg = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID( info->getObjectID() );
728 if (bldg==NULL) {
729 // got destroyed.
730 ObjectID priorID;
731 priorID = info->getObjectID();
732 info->setObjectID(INVALID_ID);
733 info->setObjectTimestamp(TheGameLogic->getFrame()+1);
734 // Scan for a GLA hole. KINDOF_REBUILD_HOLE
735 Object *obj;
736 for( obj = TheGameLogic->getFirstObject(); obj; obj = obj->getNextObject() ) {
737 if (!obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_REBUILD_HOLE)) continue;
738 RebuildHoleBehaviorInterface *rhbi = RebuildHoleBehavior::getRebuildHoleBehaviorInterfaceFromObject( obj );
739 if( rhbi ) {
740 ObjectID spawnerID = rhbi->getSpawnerID();
741 if (priorID == spawnerID) {
742 DEBUG_LOG(("AI Found hole to rebuild %s\n", bldgPlan->getName().str()));
743 info->setObjectID(obj->getID());
744 }
745 }
746 }
747 } else {
748 if (bldg->getControllingPlayer() == m_player) {
749 // Check for built or dozer missing.
750 if( bldg->getStatusBits().test( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION ) )
751 {
752 // make sure dozer is working on him.
753 ObjectID builder = bldg->getBuilderID();
754 Object* myDozer = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(builder);
755 if (myDozer==NULL) {
756 DEBUG_LOG(("AI's Dozer got killed. Find another dozer.\n"));
757 myDozer = findDozer(bldg->getPosition());
758 if (myDozer==NULL || myDozer->getAI()==NULL) {
759 continue;
760 }
761 myDozer->getAI()->aiResumeConstruction(bldg, CMD_FROM_AI);
762 } else {
763 // make sure he is building.
764 myDozer->getAI()->aiResumeConstruction(bldg, CMD_FROM_AI);
765 }
766 }
767 } else {
768 // oops, got captured.
769 info->setObjectID(INVALID_ID);
770 info->setObjectTimestamp(TheGameLogic->getFrame()+1);
771 }
772 }
773 }
774 if (info->getObjectID()==INVALID_ID && info->getObjectTimestamp()>0) {
775 // this object was built at some time, and got destroyed at or near objectTimestamp.
776 // Wait a few seconds before initiating a rebuild.
777 if (info->getObjectTimestamp()+TheAI->getAiData()->m_rebuildDelaySeconds*LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND > TheGameLogic->getFrame()) {
778 continue;
779 } else {
780 DEBUG_LOG(("Enabling rebuild for %s\n", info->getTemplateName().str()));
781 info->setObjectTimestamp(0); // ready to build.
782 }
783 }
784 // check if this building has any "rebuilds" left
785 if (info->isBuildable())
786 {
787 Object *bldg = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID( info->getObjectID() );
788
789 if (bldg == NULL)
790 {
791
792
793#ifdef USE_DOZER
794 // dozer-construct the building
795 bldg = buildStructureWithDozer(bldgPlan, info);
796 // store the object with the build order
797 if (bldg)
798 {
799 info->setObjectID( bldg->getID() );
800 info->decrementNumRebuilds();
801
802 m_readyToBuildStructure = false;
803 m_structureTimer = TheAI->getAiData()->m_structureSeconds*LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND;
804 if (m_player->getMoney()->countMoney() < TheAI->getAiData()->m_resourcesPoor) {
805 m_structureTimer = m_structureTimer/TheAI->getAiData()->m_structuresPoorMod;
806 } else if (m_player->getMoney()->countMoney() > TheAI->getAiData()->m_resourcesWealthy) {
807 m_structureTimer = m_structureTimer/TheAI->getAiData()->m_structuresWealthyMod;
808 }
809 m_frameLastBuildingBuilt = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
810 // only build one building per delay loop
811 break;
812 } // bldg built
813
814#else
815 // force delay between rebuilds
816 if (TheGameLogic->getFrame() - m_frameLastBuildingBuilt < framesToBuild)
817 {
818 m_buildDelay = framesToBuild - (TheGameLogic->getFrame() - m_frameLastBuildingBuilt);
819 return;
820 } else {
821 // building is missing, (re)build it
822 // deduct money to build, if we have it
823 Int cost = bldgPlan->calcCostToBuild( m_player );
824 if (m_player->getMoney()->countMoney() >= cost)
825 {
826 // we have the money, deduct it
827 m_player->getMoney()->withdraw( cost );
828
829 // inst-construct the building
830 bldg = buildStructureNow(bldgPlan, info, NULL);
831 // store the object with the build order
832 if (bldg)
833 {
834 info->setObjectID( bldg->getID() );
835 info->decrementNumRebuilds();
836
837 m_readyToBuildStructure = false;
838 m_structureTimer = TheAI->getAiData()->m_structureSeconds*LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND;
839 if (m_player->getMoney()->countMoney() < TheAI->getAiData()->m_resourcesPoor) {
840 m_structureTimer = m_structureTimer/TheAI->getAiData()->m_structuresPoorMod;
841 } else if (m_player->getMoney()->countMoney() > TheAI->getAiData()->m_resourcesWealthy) {
842 m_structureTimer = m_structureTimer/TheAI->getAiData()->m_structuresWealthyMod;
843 }
844 m_frameLastBuildingBuilt = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
845 // only build one building per delay loop
846 break;
847 } // bldg built
848 } // have money
849 } // rebuild delay ok
850#endif
851 } // building missing
852 } // is buildable
853 }
854 }
855}
856
857//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
859//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
860void AIPlayer::aiPreTeamDestroy( const Team *deletedTeam )
861{
862 {
863 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<TeamInQueue> iter = iterate_TeamBuildQueue(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
864 {
865 TeamInQueue *team = iter.cur();
866 if (team->m_team == deletedTeam) {
867 // The members of the team all got killed before we could finish building the team.
868 removeFrom_TeamBuildQueue(team);
869 team->deleteInstance();
870 iter = iterate_TeamBuildQueue();
871 }
872 }
873 }
874 {
875 for ( DLINK_ITERATOR<TeamInQueue> iter = iterate_TeamReadyQueue(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
876 {
877 TeamInQueue *team = iter.cur();
878 if (team->m_team == deletedTeam) {
879 // The members of the team all got killed before we could activate the team.
880 removeFrom_TeamReadyQueue(team);
881 team->deleteInstance();
882 iter = iterate_TeamReadyQueue();
883 }
884 }
885 }
886}
887
888//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
890//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
891void AIPlayer::guardSupplyCenter( Team *team, Int minSupplies )
892{
893 m_supplySourceAttackCheckFrame = 0; // force check.
894 Object *warehouse = NULL;
895 if (isSupplySourceAttacked()) {
896 warehouse = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(m_attackedSupplyCenter);
897 }
898 if (warehouse==NULL) {
899 warehouse = findSupplyCenter(minSupplies);
900 }
901 if (warehouse) {
902
903 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
904 if (!theGroup) {
905 return;
906 }
907 team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
908 Coord3D location = *warehouse->getPosition();
909 // It's probably a defensive move - position towards the enemy.
910 Region2D bounds;
911 Int enemyNdx = TheScriptEngine->getSkirmishEnemyPlayer()->getPlayerIndex();
912 getPlayerStructureBounds(&bounds, enemyNdx);
913 Coord3D offset;
914 offset.zero();
915 offset.x = location.x - (bounds.lo.x+bounds.hi.x)*0.5f;
916 offset.y = location.y - (bounds.lo.y+bounds.hi.y)*0.5f;
917 offset.normalize();
918 Real radius = warehouse->getGeometryInfo().getBoundingCircleRadius()*0.8f;
919
920 location.x -= offset.x*radius;
921 location.y -= offset.y*radius;
922 theGroup->groupGuardPosition( &location, GUARDMODE_NORMAL, CMD_FROM_SCRIPT );
923
924 }
925}
926
927//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
929//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
930Bool AIPlayer::isSupplySourceAttacked( void )
931{
932 const Int SCAN_RATE = 10; // don't scan more often than every 10 seconds.
933 UnsignedInt curFrame = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
934 if (curFrame==0) {
935 m_supplySourceAttackCheckFrame = curFrame+SCAN_RATE;
936 return false; // can't be attacked on first frame.
937 }
938 m_attackedSupplyCenter = INVALID_ID;
939 if (curFrame < m_supplySourceAttackCheckFrame) {
940 return false;
941 }
942 if (m_player->getAttackedFrame()+SCAN_RATE < curFrame) {
943 return false; // haven't been attacked recently.
944 }
945 m_supplySourceAttackCheckFrame = curFrame+SCAN_RATE;
946
947 // Scan my units.
948 Player::PlayerTeamList::const_iterator it;
949 for (it = m_player->getPlayerTeams()->begin(); it != m_player->getPlayerTeams()->end(); ++it) {
950 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
951 Team *team = iter.cur();
952 if (!team) {
953 continue;
954 }
955 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> objIter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !objIter.done(); objIter.advance()) {
956 Object *obj = objIter.cur();
957 if (!obj) {
958 continue;
959 }
960 if (!obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_CASH_GENERATOR) && !obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_DOZER) &&
961 !obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_HARVESTER)) {
962 continue;
963 }
964 // check for attacked.
965 BodyModuleInterface *body = obj->getBodyModule();
966 if (body) {
967 const DamageInfo *info = body->getLastDamageInfo();
968 if (info) {
969 if (info->out.m_noEffect) {
970 continue;
971 }
972 if (body->getLastDamageTimestamp() + SCAN_RATE > curFrame) {
973 // winner.
974 m_attackedSupplyCenter = obj->getID();
975 return true;
976 }
977 }
978 }
979 }
980 }
981 }
982 return false;
983}
984
985//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
987//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
988Bool AIPlayer::isSupplySourceSafe( Int minSupplies )
989{
990 Object *warehouse = findSupplyCenter(minSupplies);
991 if (warehouse==NULL) return true; // it's safe cause it doesn't exist.
992 return (isLocationSafe(warehouse->getPosition(), warehouse->getTemplate()));
993}
994
995//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
997//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
998Bool AIPlayer::isLocationSafe(const Coord3D *pos, const ThingTemplate *tthing )
999{
1000 if (tthing == NULL) return 0;
1001
1002 // See if we have enemies.
1003 Real radius = TheAI->getAiData()->m_supplyCenterSafeRadius;
1004 radius += tthing->getTemplateGeometryInfo().getBoundingCircleRadius();
1005
1006 // only consider enemies.
1007 PartitionFilterPlayerAffiliation filterTeam(m_player, (ALLOW_ALLIES|ALLOW_NEUTRAL), false);
1008
1009 // and only stuff that is not dead
1010 PartitionFilterAlive filterAlive;
1011
1012 // and only stuff that isn't stealthed (and not detected)
1013 // (note that stealthed allies aren't hidden from us, but we're only looking for enemies here)
1014 PartitionFilterRejectByObjectStatus filterStealth( MAKE_OBJECT_STATUS_MASK( OBJECT_STATUS_STEALTHED ),
1015 MAKE_OBJECT_STATUS_MASK2( OBJECT_STATUS_DETECTED, OBJECT_STATUS_DISGUISED ) );
1016
1017 // (optional) only stuff that is significant
1018 PartitionFilterInsignificantBuildings filterInsignificant(true, false);
1019
1020 PartitionFilterRejectByKindOf filterHarvesters(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(KINDOF_HARVESTER), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
1021
1022 PartitionFilterRejectByKindOf filterDozer(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(KINDOF_DOZER), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
1023
1024 PartitionFilter *filters[16];
1025 Int numFilters = 0;
1026
1027 filters[numFilters++] = &filterTeam;
1028 filters[numFilters++] = &filterAlive;
1029 filters[numFilters++] = &filterStealth;
1030
1031 filters[numFilters++] = &filterInsignificant;
1032 filters[numFilters++] = &filterHarvesters;
1033 filters[numFilters++] = &filterDozer;
1034 filters[numFilters] = NULL;
1035
1036 Object *enemy = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject( pos, radius, FROM_BOUNDINGSPHERE_2D, filters );
1037 if (enemy!=NULL) {
1038 return false;
1039 }
1040 return true;
1041
1042} // isSupplySourceSafe
1043
1044
1045// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1047// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1048void AIPlayer::onUnitProduced( Object *factory, Object *unit )
1049{
1050 Bool found = false;
1051 Bool supplyTruck;
1052
1053 // factory could be NULL at the start of the game.
1054 if (factory == NULL) {
1055 return;
1056 }
1057
1058 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<TeamInQueue> iter = iterate_TeamBuildQueue(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1059 {
1060 TeamInQueue *team = iter.cur();
1061 // find work order entry and delete it
1062 WorkOrder *order;
1063 if (found) break;
1064 for( order = team->m_workOrders; order; order = order->m_next )
1065 {
1066 if (order->m_factoryID == factory->getID() && order->m_numCompleted < order->m_numRequired && unit->getTemplate()->isEquivalentTo(order->m_thing))
1067 {
1068 // found associated order, mark it complete.
1069 order->m_numCompleted++;
1070 // put new unit into the team under construction
1071 if (team->m_team)
1072 unit->setTeam( team->m_team );
1073 if (team->m_reinforcement) {
1074 team->m_reinforcementID = unit->getID();
1075 }
1076 AIUpdateInterface *ai = unit->getAIUpdateInterface();
1077 if (team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_hasHomeLocation) {
1078 if (ai) {
1079 std::vector<Coord3D> path;
1080 path.push_back( *ai->getGoalPosition() );
1081 path.push_back(team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_homeLocation);
1082 ai->aiFollowExitProductionPath(&path, NULL, CMD_FROM_AI);
1083 }
1084 }
1085
1086 order->m_factoryID = INVALID_ID; // no longer using this factory.
1087 if (ai) {
1088 // tell it to start gathering resources.
1089 // Here is the special bit for this exit style, force wanting on SupplyTruck types
1090 SupplyTruckAIInterface* supplyTruckAI = ai->getSupplyTruckAIInterface();
1091 if( supplyTruckAI ) {
1092 if (order->m_isResourceGatherer) {
1093 supplyTruck = true;
1094 } else {
1095 supplyTruck = false;
1096 }
1097 supplyTruckAI->setForceWantingState(supplyTruck);
1098 if (supplyTruck) {
1099 // assign to a supply depot.
1100 for( BuildListInfo *info = m_player->getBuildList(); info; info = info->getNext() )
1101 {
1102 if (info->isSupplyBuilding() && info->getDesiredGatherers()>0 &&
1103 info->getDesiredGatherers()>info->getCurrentGatherers()) {
1104 Object *obj = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(info->getObjectID());
1105 if (obj) {
1106 info->setCurrentGatherers(info->getCurrentGatherers()+1);
1107 // Note - although this is the ai, we are sending in CMD_FROM_PLAYER.
1108 // This causes the dock object to stick in the docking interface.
1109 // The supply truck ai issues dock commands, and they become confused.
1110 // Thus, player. jba. ;(
1111 ai->aiDock(obj, CMD_FROM_PLAYER);
1112 }
1113 }
1114 }
1115
1116 }
1117 }
1118 }
1119 found = true;
1120 break;
1121 }
1122 }
1123 }
1124 if (!supplyTruck && unit->isKindOf(KINDOF_DOZER)) {
1125 if (m_dozerQueuedForRepair) {
1126 m_repairDozer = unit->getID();
1127 m_dozerQueuedForRepair =false;
1128 } else {
1129 m_buildDelay = 0;
1130 m_structureTimer = 1;
1131 }
1132 }
1133 if (!found) {
1134 DEBUG_LOG(("***AI PLAYER-Unit not found in production queue.\n"));
1135 }
1136
1137 m_teamDelay = 0; // Cause the update queues & selection to happen immediately.
1138}
1139
1140//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1144Bool AIPlayer::computeSuperweaponTarget(const SpecialPowerTemplate *power, Coord3D *retPos, Int playerNdx, Real weaponRadius)
1145{
1146
1147 Bool success = FALSE;
1148
1149 Region2D bounds;
1150 getPlayerStructureBounds(&bounds, playerNdx);
1151
1152 if( bounds.hi.x == 0
1153 && bounds.lo.x == 0
1154 && bounds.hi.y == 0
1155 && bounds.lo.y == 0
1156 )
1157 {
1158 Region3D bounds3D;
1159 // Degenerate bounds because he has no buildings. Don't give up, scan the whole map for the leftovers.
1160 TheTerrainLogic->getExtent(&bounds3D);
1161 bounds.hi.x = bounds3D.hi.x;
1162 bounds.lo.x = bounds3D.lo.x;
1163 bounds.hi.y = bounds3D.hi.y;
1164 bounds.lo.y = bounds3D.lo.y;
1165 }
1166
1167 if (weaponRadius<1.0f) {
1168 weaponRadius = 1.0f; // sanity to avoid divide by 0.
1169 }
1170
1171 Int xCount, yCount;
1172 bounds.lo.x += weaponRadius;
1173 bounds.hi.x -= weaponRadius;
1174 if (bounds.hi.x<bounds.lo.x) {
1175 bounds.hi.x = bounds.lo.x = (bounds.hi.x+bounds.lo.x)/2.0f;
1176 }
1177 if (bounds.hi.y<bounds.lo.y) {
1178 bounds.hi.y = bounds.lo.y = (bounds.hi.y+bounds.lo.y)/2.0f;
1179 }
1180
1181 xCount = REAL_TO_INT_CEIL(bounds.width()/weaponRadius)+1;
1182 yCount = REAL_TO_INT_CEIL(bounds.height()/weaponRadius)+1;
1183
1184 if (xCount>10) xCount = 10;
1185 if (yCount>10) yCount = 10;
1186
1187 Int cash = -1;
1188 Coord3D pos;
1189 Coord3D bestPos;
1190 Int x, y, xDelta, yDelta, xIndex, yIndex, xStart, yStart;
1191
1192 Bool targetMilitaryUnits = TRUE;
1193 if( power->getSpecialPowerType() == SPECIAL_SNEAK_ATTACK )
1194 {
1195 //Military units will have a negative effect on where to drop the special power.
1196 //We want to target rich areas that are poorly defended or undefended.
1197 targetMilitaryUnits = FALSE;
1198 }
1199
1200 //Randomize which way we iterate the grid. We don't always want to start in the bottom left corner incase
1201 //of a bad calculation, it'll would always end up there.
1202 switch( GameLogicRandomValue( 1, 4 ) )
1203 {
1204 case 1:
1205 //x min to max, y min to max
1206 xDelta = 1, yDelta = 1;
1207 xStart = 0, yStart = 0;
1208 break;
1209 case 2:
1210 //x max to min, y min to max
1211 xDelta = -1, yDelta = 1;
1212 xStart = xCount, yStart = 0;
1213 break;
1214 case 3:
1215 //x min to max, y max to min
1216 xDelta = 1, yDelta = -1;
1217 xStart = 0, yStart = yCount;
1218 break;
1219 case 4:
1220 default:
1221 //x max to min, y max to min
1222 xDelta = -1, yDelta = -1;
1223 xStart = xCount, yStart = yCount;
1224 break;
1225 }
1226
1227 //Calculate the generally best position
1228 xIndex = xStart;
1229 for( x = 0; x < xCount; x++, xIndex += xDelta )
1230 {
1231 yIndex = yStart;
1232 for( y = 0; y < yCount; y++, yIndex += yDelta )
1233 {
1234 pos.x = bounds.lo.x + ( bounds.width() * xIndex ) / xCount;
1235 pos.y = bounds.lo.y + ( bounds.height() * yIndex ) / yCount;
1236 pos.z = 0;
1237 Int curCash = getPlayerSuperweaponValue( &pos, playerNdx, 2*weaponRadius, targetMilitaryUnits );
1238 if ( curCash > cash)
1239 {
1240 cash = curCash;
1241 bestPos = pos;
1242 }
1243 }
1244 }
1245
1246 //Fine tune that position by looking at a even smaller radius.
1247 Coord3D veryBestPos;
1248 xCount = 11;
1249 yCount = 11;
1250 cash = -1;
1251 Int count = 0;
1252 for( x = 0; x < xCount; x++ )
1253 {
1254 for( y = 0; y < yCount; y++ )
1255 {
1256 pos.x = bestPos.x + (x-5)*(weaponRadius/10);
1257 pos.y = bestPos.y + (x-5)*(weaponRadius/10);
1258 pos.z = 0;
1259 Int curCash = getPlayerSuperweaponValue( &pos, playerNdx, weaponRadius, targetMilitaryUnits );
1260 if ( curCash > cash)
1261 {
1262 cash = curCash;
1263 veryBestPos = pos;
1264 count = 1;
1265 }
1266 else if (curCash==cash)
1267 {
1268 veryBestPos.x += pos.x;
1269 veryBestPos.y += pos.y;
1270 count++;
1271 }
1272 }
1273 }
1274 if (count>1) {
1275 veryBestPos.x /= count;
1276 veryBestPos.y /= count;
1277 }
1278 veryBestPos.z = TheTerrainLogic->getGroundHeight(veryBestPos.x, veryBestPos.y);
1279 *retPos = veryBestPos;
1280
1281 success = ( cash > -1 );
1282
1283
1284 return success;
1285
1286
1287}
1288
1289//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1293Int AIPlayer::getPlayerSuperweaponValue(Coord3D *center, Int playerNdx, Real radius, Bool includeMilitaryUnits )
1294{
1295 if (radius < 4*PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F)
1296 {
1297 radius = 4*PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F;
1298 }
1299 Player::PlayerTeamList::const_iterator it;
1300 Real cash = 0;
1301 Real radSqr = sqr(radius);
1302
1303 Player* pPlayer = ThePlayerList->getNthPlayer(playerNdx);
1304 if (pPlayer == NULL)
1305 return 0;
1306 for (it = pPlayer->getPlayerTeams()->begin(); it != pPlayer->getPlayerTeams()->end(); ++it)
1307 {
1308 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1309 {
1310 Team *team = iter.cur();
1311 if (!team) continue;
1312 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1313 {
1314 Object *pObj = iter.cur();
1315 if (!pObj)
1316 continue;
1317
1318 Bool applyNegValue = FALSE;
1319 if( !includeMilitaryUnits )
1320 {
1321 if( pObj->isKindOf( KINDOF_FS_BASE_DEFENSE ) || pObj->isKindOf( KINDOF_TECH_BASE_DEFENSE ) )
1322 {
1323 //Hostile structure
1324 applyNegValue = TRUE;
1325 }
1326 else if( pObj->isKindOf( KINDOF_VEHICLE ) || pObj->isKindOf( KINDOF_INFANTRY ) )
1327 {
1328 if( !pObj->isKindOf( KINDOF_DOZER ) && !pObj->isKindOf( KINDOF_HARVESTER ) )
1329 {
1330 //Hostile unit.
1331 applyNegValue = TRUE;
1332 }
1333 }
1334 }
1335 else if (pObj->isKindOf(KINDOF_AIRCRAFT))
1336 {
1337 if (pObj->isSignificantlyAboveTerrain())
1338 {
1339 continue; // Don't target flying aircraft. OK if in the airstrip.
1340 }
1341 }
1342 Coord3D pos = *pObj->getPosition();
1343 Real dx = center->x - pos.x;
1344 Real dy = center->y - pos.y;
1345 if (dx*dx+dy*dy<radSqr)
1346 {
1347 Real dist = sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy);
1348 Real factor = 1.0f - (dist/(2*radius)); // 1.0 in center, 0.5 on edges.
1349 Real value = pObj->getTemplate()->calcCostToBuild(pPlayer);
1350 if (pObj->isKindOf(KINDOF_COMMANDCENTER))
1351 {
1352 if( !includeMilitaryUnits )
1353 value = value * 5.0f; //Command centers are prime targets for sneak attacks.
1354 else
1355 value = value / 10; // Command centers cannot be killed by any superweapon, so we don't want to target them as highly. jba.
1356 }
1357 if (pObj->isKindOf( KINDOF_FS_SUPERWEAPON ) )
1358 {
1359 if( !includeMilitaryUnits )
1360 value = value * 5.0f; //Superweapons are prime targets for sneak attacks.
1361 else
1362 value = value / 10; // Superweapons cannot be killed by any superweapon, so we don't want to target them as highly. jba.
1363 }
1364 if( applyNegValue )
1365 {
1366 cash -= factor * value * 5.0f; //Extremely undesired
1367 }
1368 else
1369 {
1370 cash += factor * value;
1371 }
1372 }
1373 }
1374 }
1375 }
1376 return cash;
1377}
1378// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1383// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1384Bool AIPlayer::startTraining( WorkOrder *order, Bool busyOK, AsciiString teamName)
1385{
1386 Object *factory = findFactory(order->m_thing, busyOK);
1387 if( factory )
1388 {
1389 ProductionUpdateInterface *pu = factory->getProductionUpdateInterface();
1390 if (pu && pu->queueCreateUnit( order->m_thing, pu->requestUniqueUnitID() )) {
1391 order->m_factoryID = factory->getID();
1392 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugAI) {
1393 AsciiString teamStr = "Queuing ";
1394 teamStr.concat(order->m_thing->getName());
1395 teamStr.concat(" for ");
1396 teamStr.concat(teamName);
1397 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
1398 }
1399 return true;
1400 }
1401 } // end if
1402
1403 return FALSE;
1404
1405}
1406
1407// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1411// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1412Object *AIPlayer::findFactory(const ThingTemplate *thing, Bool busyOK)
1413{
1414 Object *busyFactory = NULL; // We prefer a factory that isn't busy.
1415 for( BuildListInfo *info = m_player->getBuildList(); info; info = info->getNext() )
1416 {
1417 Object *factory = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID( info->getObjectID() );
1418 if( factory )
1419 {
1420 if (factory->getControllingPlayer() != m_player) {
1421 info->setObjectID(INVALID_ID);
1422 continue;
1423 }
1424 // ignore buildings that are under construction.
1425 if (factory->testStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION))
1426 continue;
1427 // also ignore buildings that are being sold.
1428 if (factory->testStatus(OBJECT_STATUS_SOLD))
1429 continue;
1430 ProductionUpdateInterface *pu = factory->getProductionUpdateInterface();
1431 // If it doesn't produce, continue.
1432 if (!pu) continue;
1433 // if we can't create the unit do nothing
1434 if( TheBuildAssistant->isPossibleToMakeUnit( factory, thing ) == FALSE )
1435 continue;
1436 // If the factory is not busy, return it.
1437 Bool busy = pu->getProductionCount()>0;
1438 if (!busy) return factory; // found a not busy factory.
1439 if (busyOK) busyFactory = factory;
1440 } // end if
1441
1442 } // end for
1443 // We didn't find an idle factory, so return the busy one.
1444 if (busyOK) return busyFactory;
1445 return NULL;
1446}
1447
1448// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1450// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1451Bool AIPlayer::isPossibleToBuildTeam( TeamPrototype *proto, Bool requireIdleFactory, Bool &notEnoughMoney)
1452{
1453 /* Make sure we have at least one idle factory, and factories for all unit types. */
1454 Bool anyIdle = false;
1455 Int cost=0;
1456 notEnoughMoney = false;
1457 for( int i=0; i<proto->getTemplateInfo()->m_numUnitsInfo; i++ )
1458 {
1459 const TCreateUnitsInfo *unitInfo = &proto->getTemplateInfo()->m_unitsInfo[0];
1460 const ThingTemplate *thing = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( unitInfo[i].unitThingName );
1461 if (thing) {
1462 Int thingCost = thing->calcCostToBuild(m_player);
1463 if (NULL == findFactory(thing, true)) {
1464 // Couldn't find a factory.
1465 return false;
1466 }
1467 if (NULL != findFactory(thing, false)) {
1468 // Found an idle factory.
1469 anyIdle = true;
1470 }
1471 cost += thingCost * ((unitInfo[i].maxUnits+unitInfo[i].minUnits)/2.0f);
1472 }
1473 }
1474 cost *= TheAI->getAiData()->m_teamResourcesToBuild;
1475 if (m_player->getMoney()->countMoney() < cost) {
1476 notEnoughMoney = true;
1477 return false; // too expensive
1478 }
1479 if (anyIdle)
1480 {
1481 return true;
1482 }
1483 if (!requireIdleFactory)
1484 {
1485 // Doesn't require an idle factory, so we're ok.
1486 return true;
1487 }
1488 return false;
1489}
1490
1491// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1494// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1495Bool AIPlayer::isAGoodIdeaToBuildTeam( TeamPrototype *proto )
1496{
1497 // Check condition.
1498 if (!proto->evaluateProductionCondition()) {
1499 return false;
1500 }
1501 // check build limit
1502 if (proto->countTeamInstances() >= proto->getTemplateInfo()->m_maxInstances){
1503 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugAI) {
1504 AsciiString str;
1505 str.format("Team %s not chosen - %d already exist.", proto->getName().str(), proto->countTeamInstances());
1506 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(str, false);
1507 }
1508 return false; // Max already built.
1509 }
1510
1511 for ( DLINK_ITERATOR<TeamInQueue> iter = iterate_TeamBuildQueue(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1512 {
1513 TeamInQueue *team = iter.cur();
1514 if (team->m_team->getPrototype() == proto) {
1515 return false; // currently building one of these.
1516 }
1517 }
1518 Bool needMoney;
1519 if (!isPossibleToBuildTeam( proto, true, needMoney)) {
1520 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugAI) {
1521 AsciiString str;
1522 if (needMoney) {
1523 str.format("Team %s not chosen - Not enough money.", proto->getName().str());
1524 } else {
1525 str.format("Team %s not chosen - Factory/tech missing or busy.", proto->getName().str());
1526 }
1527 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(str, false);
1528 }
1529 return false;
1530 }
1531 return true;
1532}
1533
1534// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1536// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1537Bool AIPlayer::selectTeamToReinforce( Int minPriority )
1538{
1539 // Find a high production priority team that needs reinforcements.
1540 Player::PlayerTeamList::const_iterator t;
1541 Team *curTeam = NULL;
1542 Int curPriority = minPriority; // Don't reinforce a team unless it is above min priority.
1543 const ThingTemplate *curThing = NULL;
1544 for (t = m_player->getPlayerTeams()->begin(); t != m_player->getPlayerTeams()->end(); ++t)
1545 {
1546 TeamPrototype *proto = (*t);
1547 Bool busy = false;
1548 for ( DLINK_ITERATOR<TeamInQueue> iter = iterate_TeamBuildQueue(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1549 {
1550 TeamInQueue *team = iter.cur();
1551 if (team->m_team->getPrototype() == proto) {
1552 busy = true; // currently building one of these.
1553 }
1554 }
1555 if (busy) continue;
1556 if (proto->getTemplateInfo()->m_automaticallyReinforce && proto->getTemplateInfo()->m_productionPriority>curPriority) {
1557 // Check the team instances.
1558 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = proto->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
1559 {
1560 Team *team = iter.cur();
1561 if (team->hasAnyUnits() == false)
1562 {
1563 continue; // empty.
1564 }
1565 const TCreateUnitsInfo *unitInfo = &team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_unitsInfo[0];
1566 for( int i=0; i<team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_numUnitsInfo; i++ )
1567 {
1568 if (unitInfo[i].maxUnits < 1) continue;
1569 const ThingTemplate *thing = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( unitInfo[i].unitThingName );
1570 if (thing==NULL) continue;
1571 Int count=0;
1572 team->countObjectsByThingTemplate(1, &thing, false, &count);
1573 if (count < unitInfo[i].maxUnits)
1574 {
1575 // See if there is a factory available.
1576 if (NULL != findFactory(thing, false))
1577 {
1578 curTeam = team;
1579 curPriority = proto->getTemplateInfo()->m_productionPriority;
1580 curThing = thing;
1581 }
1582 }
1583 }
1584 }
1585 }
1586 }
1587 if (curTeam && curThing)
1588 {
1589 /* We have something to build. */
1590 TeamInQueue *teamQ = newInstance(TeamInQueue);
1591 // Put in front of queue.
1592 prependTo_TeamBuildQueue(teamQ);
1593 teamQ->m_priorityBuild = false;
1594 teamQ->m_reinforcement = true;
1595
1596 WorkOrder *order = newInstance(WorkOrder);
1597 order->m_thing = curThing;
1598 order->m_factoryID = INVALID_ID;
1599 order->m_numRequired = 1;
1600 order->m_required = true;
1601 // prepend to head of list
1602 order->m_next = NULL;
1603 teamQ->m_workOrders = order;
1604 teamQ->m_frameStarted = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
1605 teamQ->m_team = curTeam;
1606
1607 AsciiString teamName = curTeam->getPrototype()->getName();
1608 teamName.concat(" - AutoReinforcing one ");
1609 teamName.concat(curThing->getName());
1610 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, false);
1611
1612 // start the creation of a new unit
1613 Coord3D origin;
1614 origin = curTeam->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_homeLocation;
1615 if (curTeam->getFirstItemIn_TeamMemberList())
1616 {
1617 origin = *curTeam->getFirstItemIn_TeamMemberList()->getPosition();
1618 }
1619 Object *unit = curTeam->tryToRecruit(curThing, &origin, TheAI->getAiData()->m_maxRecruitDistance);
1620 if (unit)
1621 {
1622 order->m_numCompleted = 1;
1623
1624 AsciiString teamStr = "Team '";
1625 teamStr.concat(curTeam->getPrototype()->getName());
1626 teamStr.concat("' recruits ");
1627 teamStr.concat(curThing->getName());
1628 teamStr.concat(" from team '");
1629 teamStr.concat(unit->getTeam()->getPrototype()->getName());
1630 teamStr.concat("'");
1631 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
1632
1633 unit->setTeam(curTeam);
1634
1635 teamQ->m_reinforcementID = unit->getID();
1636
1637 AIUpdateInterface *ai = unit->getAIUpdateInterface();
1638 if (ai)
1639 {
1640 ai->aiIdle(CMD_FROM_AI);
1641 }
1642 } else {
1643 startTraining( order, teamQ->m_priorityBuild, teamQ->m_team->getName());
1644 }
1645 m_teamDelay = 0;
1646 return true;
1647 }
1648 return false;
1649}
1650
1651// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1653// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1654Bool AIPlayer::selectTeamToBuild( void )
1655{
1656
1657 // find the highest priority of all teams
1658 Player::PlayerTeamList::const_iterator t;
1659 const Int invalidPri = -99999;
1660 Int hiPri = invalidPri;
1661 // collect all teams that are possible to build, and are at the highest priority
1662 Player::PlayerTeamList candidateList1;
1663 for (t = m_player->getPlayerTeams()->begin(); t != m_player->getPlayerTeams()->end(); ++t)
1664 {
1665 if (isAGoodIdeaToBuildTeam(*t))
1666 {
1667 candidateList1.push_back( (*t) );
1668 Int pri = (*t)->getTemplateInfo()->m_productionPriority;
1669
1670 if (pri > hiPri)
1671 {
1672 hiPri = pri;
1673 }
1674 }
1675 }
1676
1677 if (selectTeamToReinforce(hiPri)) {
1678 return true;
1679 }
1680
1681 // check if no team prototypes are valid for production
1682 if (hiPri == invalidPri)
1683 return false;
1684
1685 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugAI) {
1686 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage("**AI** Selecting team to build", false);
1687 }
1688
1689 // collect all teams that are possible to build, and are at the highest priority
1690 Player::PlayerTeamList candidateList;
1691 Int count = 0;
1692 for (t = candidateList1.begin(); t != candidateList1.end(); ++t)
1693 {
1694 if ((*t)->getTemplateInfo()->m_productionPriority == hiPri)
1695 {
1696 candidateList.push_back( (*t) );
1697 count++;
1698 }
1699 }
1700
1701 // pick a random team from the hi-priority set
1702 Int which = GameLogicRandomValue( 0, count-1 );
1703
1704 TeamPrototype *teamProto = NULL;
1705 Int i = 0;
1706 for (t = candidateList.begin(); t != candidateList.end(); ++t)
1707 {
1708 if (i == which)
1709 {
1710 teamProto = (*t);
1711 break;
1712 }
1713
1714 i++;
1715 }
1716 if (teamProto) {
1717 if (!teamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_hasHomeLocation && !isSkirmishAI()) {
1718 AsciiString teamStr = "Error : team '";
1719 teamStr.concat(teamProto->getName());
1720 teamStr.concat("' has no Home Position (or Origin).");
1721 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
1722 }
1723 // Build it at low priority, as we have selected it automagically.
1724 buildSpecificAITeam(teamProto, false);
1725 m_readyToBuildTeam = false;
1726 m_teamTimer = m_teamSeconds*LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND;
1727 if (m_player->getMoney()->countMoney() < TheAI->getAiData()->m_resourcesPoor) {
1728 m_teamTimer = m_teamTimer/TheAI->getAiData()->m_teamPoorMod;
1729 } else if (m_player->getMoney()->countMoney() > TheAI->getAiData()->m_resourcesWealthy) {
1730 m_teamTimer = m_teamTimer/TheAI->getAiData()->m_teamWealthyMod;
1731 }
1732 return true;
1733 }
1734 return false;
1735}
1736

1741{
1742 //
1743 AsciiString teamStr = "Error : Solo ai doesn't support BuildSpecificBuilding. '";
1744 teamStr.concat(thingName);
1745 teamStr.concat("' not built.");
1746 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
1747}

1749// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1751// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1752void AIPlayer::buildUpgrade(const AsciiString &upgrade)
1753{
1754 const UpgradeTemplate *curUpgrade = TheUpgradeCenter->findUpgrade(upgrade);
1755 if (curUpgrade==NULL) {
1756 AsciiString msg = "Upgrade ";
1757 msg.concat(upgrade);
1758 msg.concat(" does not exist. Ignoring request.");
1759 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage( msg, false);
1760 return;
1761 }
1762 if (curUpgrade->getUpgradeType()==UPGRADE_TYPE_OBJECT) {
1763 AsciiString msg = "Player build upgrade: Upgrade ";
1764 msg.concat(upgrade);
1765 msg.concat(" is an object, not a player upgrade. Ignoring request.");
1766 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage( msg, false);
1767 return;
1768 }
1769 // See if it is in progress.
1770 if (m_player->hasUpgradeInProduction(curUpgrade)) {
1771 AsciiString msg = TheNameKeyGenerator->keyToName(m_player->getPlayerNameKey());
1772 msg.concat(" already has upgrade ");
1773 msg.concat(upgrade);
1774 msg.concat(" queued. Ignoring request.");
1775 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage( msg, false);
1776 return;
1777 }
1778 // See if it is in progress.
1779 if (m_player->hasUpgradeComplete(curUpgrade)) {
1780 AsciiString msg = TheNameKeyGenerator->keyToName(m_player->getPlayerNameKey());
1781 msg.concat(" already has upgrade ");
1782 msg.concat(upgrade);
1783 msg.concat(" completed. Ignoring request.");
1784 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage( msg, false);
1785 return;
1786 }
1787
1788
1789 // No money.
1790 if( TheUpgradeCenter->canAffordUpgrade( m_player, curUpgrade ) == FALSE ) {
1791 AsciiString msg = TheNameKeyGenerator->keyToName(m_player->getPlayerNameKey());
1792 msg.concat(" lacks money to build upgrade ");
1793 msg.concat(upgrade);
1794 msg.concat(" at this time. Ignoring request.");
1795 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage( msg, false);
1796 return;
1797 }
1798 // Find a production queue.
1799 for( const BuildListInfo *info = m_player->getBuildList(); info; info = info->getNext() )
1800 {
1801 Object *factory = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID( info->getObjectID() );
1802 if( factory )
1803 {
1804 if( factory->getStatusBits().test( OBJECT_STATUS_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION ) )
1805 continue;
1806 if( factory->getStatusBits().test( OBJECT_STATUS_SOLD ) )
1807 continue;
1808 Bool canUpgradeHere = false;
1809 const CommandSet *commandSet = TheControlBar->findCommandSet( factory->getCommandSetString() );
1810 if( commandSet == NULL) continue;
1811 for( Int j = 0; j < MAX_COMMANDS_PER_SET; j++ )
1812 {
1813 //Get the command button.
1814 const CommandButton *commandButton = commandSet->getCommandButton(j);
1815 if (commandButton==NULL) continue;
1816 if (commandButton->getName().isEmpty() ) continue;
1817 if (commandButton->getUpgradeTemplate() == NULL ) continue;
1818 if (commandButton->getUpgradeTemplate()->getUpgradeName() == curUpgrade->getUpgradeName()) {
1819 canUpgradeHere = true;
1820 }
1821 }
1822 if (!canUpgradeHere) continue;
1823 ProductionUpdateInterface *pu = factory->getProductionUpdateInterface();
1824 // If it doesn't produce, continue.
1825 if (!pu) continue;
1826 // Try to queue it.
1827 if (pu->queueUpgrade(curUpgrade)) {
1828 AsciiString msg = TheNameKeyGenerator->keyToName(m_player->getPlayerNameKey());
1829 msg.concat(" queues ");
1830 msg.concat(curUpgrade->getUpgradeName());
1831 msg.concat(" at ");
1832 msg.concat(factory->getTemplate()->getName());
1833 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage( msg, false);
1834 return;
1835 }
1836 } // end if
1837 } // end for
1838
1839 AsciiString msg = TheNameKeyGenerator->keyToName(m_player->getPlayerNameKey());
1840 msg.concat(" lacks factory to build upgrade ");
1841 msg.concat(upgrade);
1842 msg.concat(" at this time. Ignoring request.");
1843 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage( msg, false);
1844 return;
1845}
1846
1847// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1849// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1850void AIPlayer::buildBySupplies(Int minimumCash, const AsciiString& thingName)
1851{
1852 Object *bestSupplyWarehouse = findSupplyCenter(minimumCash);
1853 const ThingTemplate* tTemplate = TheThingFactory->findTemplate(thingName);
1854 if (!tTemplate->isKindOf(KINDOF_CASH_GENERATOR)) {
1855 // Build by the current warehouse.
1856 Object *curWarehouse = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(m_curWarehouseID);
1857 if (curWarehouse) {
1858 bestSupplyWarehouse = curWarehouse;
1859 }
1860 }
1861
1862
1863 if (bestSupplyWarehouse && tTemplate) {
1864 Coord3D location;
1865 location = *bestSupplyWarehouse->getPosition();
1866 // offset back towards the base.
1867 Coord2D offset;
1868 offset.x = location.x - m_baseCenter.x;
1869 offset.y = location.y - m_baseCenter.y;
1870 offset.normalize();
1871 Real radius = 3*PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F;
1872 if (!tTemplate->isKindOf(KINDOF_CASH_GENERATOR)) {
1873 // It's probably a defensive structure - build towards the enemy.
1874 Region2D bounds;
1875 Int enemyNdx = TheScriptEngine->getSkirmishEnemyPlayer()->getPlayerIndex();
1876 getPlayerStructureBounds(&bounds, enemyNdx);
1877 offset.x = location.x - (bounds.lo.x+bounds.hi.x)*0.5f;
1878 offset.y = location.y - (bounds.lo.y+bounds.hi.y)*0.5f;
1879 offset.normalize();
1880 radius = bestSupplyWarehouse->getGeometryInfo().getBoundingCircleRadius();
1881 }
1882 location.x -= offset.x*radius;
1883 location.y -= offset.y*radius;
1884 Real angle = tTemplate->getPlacementViewAngle();
1885
1886 // validate the the position to build at is valid
1887 Bool valid=false;
1888 Coord3D newPos = location;
1889 if( TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &location, tTemplate, angle,
1890 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
1891 NULL, m_player ) != LBC_OK ) {
1892 // Warn.
1893 const Coord3D *warehouseLocation = bestSupplyWarehouse->getPosition();
1894 AsciiString debugMessage;
1895 debugMessage.format(" %s - buildBySupplies unable to place near dock at (%.2f,%.2f). Attempting to adjust position.",
1896 tTemplate->getName().str(),
1897 warehouseLocation->x,
1898 warehouseLocation->y
1899 );
1900 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(debugMessage, false);
1901 if( TheGlobalData->m_debugSupplyCenterPlacement )
1902 DEBUG_LOG(("%s", debugMessage.str()));
1903 // try to fix.
1904 Real posOffset;
1905 // Wiggle it a little :)
1906 for (posOffset = 0; posOffset<2*SUPPLY_CENTER_CLOSE_DIST; posOffset += 2*PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F) {
1907 Real offset = posOffset/2;
1908 Real xPos, yPos;
1909 yPos = location.y-offset;
1910 for (xPos = location.x-offset; xPos <= location.x+offset; xPos+=PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F) {
1911 newPos.x = xPos;
1912 newPos.y = yPos;
1913 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, tTemplate, angle,
1914 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
1915 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
1916 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
1917 NULL, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
1918 if (valid) break;
1919 if( TheGlobalData->m_debugSupplyCenterPlacement )
1920 DEBUG_LOG(("buildBySupplies -- Fail at (%.2f,%.2f)\n", newPos.x, newPos.y));
1921 newPos.y = yPos+posOffset;
1922 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, tTemplate, angle,
1923 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
1924 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
1925 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
1926 NULL, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
1927 if (valid) break;
1928 if( TheGlobalData->m_debugSupplyCenterPlacement )
1929 DEBUG_LOG(("buildBySupplies -- Fail at (%.2f,%.2f)\n", newPos.x, newPos.y));
1930 }
1931 if (valid) break;
1932 xPos = location.x-offset;
1933 for (yPos = location.y-offset; yPos <= location.y+offset; yPos+=PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F) {
1934 newPos.x = xPos;
1935 newPos.y = yPos;
1936 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, tTemplate, angle,
1937 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
1938 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
1939 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
1940 NULL, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
1941 if (valid) break;
1942 if( TheGlobalData->m_debugSupplyCenterPlacement )
1943 DEBUG_LOG(("buildBySupplies -- Fail at (%.2f,%.2f)\n", newPos.x, newPos.y));
1944 newPos.x = xPos+posOffset;
1945 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, tTemplate, angle,
1946 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
1947 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
1948 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
1949 NULL, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
1950 if (valid) break;
1951 if( TheGlobalData->m_debugSupplyCenterPlacement )
1952 DEBUG_LOG(("buildBySupplies -- Fail at (%.2f,%.2f)\n", newPos.x, newPos.y));
1953 }
1954 if (valid) break;
1955 }
1956 }
1957 if (valid)
1958 {
1959 if( TheGlobalData->m_debugSupplyCenterPlacement )
1960 DEBUG_LOG(("buildAISupplyCenter -- SUCCESS at (%.2f,%.2f)\n", newPos.x, newPos.y));
1961 location = newPos;
1962 }
1963 TheTerrainVisual->removeAllBibs(); // isLocationLegalToBuild adds bib feedback, turn it off. jba.
1964 location.z = 0; // All build list locations are ground relative.
1965 m_player->addToPriorityBuildList(thingName, &location, angle);
1966 m_curWarehouseID = bestSupplyWarehouse->getID();
1967 }
1968}

1970// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1972// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1973Bool AIPlayer::calcClosestConstructionZoneLocation( const ThingTemplate *constructTemplate, Coord3D *location )
1974{
1975 if( !constructTemplate || !location )
1976 {
1977 return FALSE;
1978 }
1979
1980 Bool success = FALSE;
1981
1982 // offset back towards the base.
1983 Coord2D offset;
1984 offset.x = location->x - m_baseCenter.x;
1985 offset.y = location->y - m_baseCenter.y;
1986 offset.normalize();
1987
1988 Real angle = constructTemplate->getPlacementViewAngle();
1989
1990 // validate the the position to build at is valid
1991 Bool valid=false;
1992 Coord3D newPos = *location;
1993 if( TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( location, constructTemplate, angle, BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP, NULL, m_player ) != LBC_OK )
1994 {
1995 // Warn.
1996 AsciiString bldgName = constructTemplate->getName();
1997 bldgName.concat(" - calcClosestConstructionZoneLocation unable to place. Attempting to adjust position.");
1998 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage( bldgName, false );
1999 // try to fix.
2000 Real posOffset;
2001 // Wiggle it a little :)
2002 for( posOffset = 0; posOffset < 2 * SUPPLY_CENTER_CLOSE_DIST; posOffset += 2 * PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F )
2003 {
2004 Real offset = posOffset / 2;
2005 Real xPos, yPos;
2006 yPos = location->y - offset;
2007 for( xPos = location->x - offset; xPos <= location->x + offset; xPos += PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F )
2008 {
2009 newPos.x = xPos;
2010 newPos.y = yPos;
2011 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, constructTemplate, angle,
2012 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
2013 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
2014 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
2015 NULL, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
2016 if( valid )
2017 break;
2018
2019 newPos.y = yPos + posOffset;
2020 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, constructTemplate, angle,
2021 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
2022 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
2023 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
2024 NULL, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
2025 }
2026
2027 if( valid )
2028 break;
2029
2030 xPos = location->x - offset;
2031 for( yPos = location->y - offset; yPos <= location->y + offset; yPos += PATHFIND_CELL_SIZE_F )
2032 {
2033 newPos.x = xPos;
2034 newPos.y = yPos;
2035 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, constructTemplate, angle,
2036 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
2037 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
2038 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
2039 NULL, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
2040 if( valid )
2041 break;
2042
2043 newPos.x = xPos + posOffset;
2044 valid = TheBuildAssistant->isLocationLegalToBuild( &newPos, constructTemplate, angle,
2045 BuildAssistant::CLEAR_PATH |
2046 BuildAssistant::TERRAIN_RESTRICTIONS |
2047 BuildAssistant::NO_OBJECT_OVERLAP,
2048 NULL, m_player ) == LBC_OK;
2049 }
2050
2051 if( valid )
2052 break;
2053 }
2054 }
2055 if( valid )
2056 {
2057 //We succeeded in calculating the best position.
2058 location->set( &newPos );
2059 success = TRUE;
2060 }
2061 else
2062 {
2063 //We failed to calculate a position, so zero out the position.
2064 location->zero();
2065 success = FALSE;
2066 }
2067
2068 TheTerrainVisual->removeAllBibs(); // isLocationLegalToBuild adds bib feedback, turn it off. jba.
2069
2070 return success;
2071
2072}

2177// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2179// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2180Object *AIPlayer::findSupplyCenter(Int minimumCash)
2181{
2182 Object *bestSupplyWarehouse = NULL;
2183 Real bestDistSqr = 0;
2184 Object *obj;
2185 Coord3D enemyCenter;
2186 enemyCenter.zero();
2187 Region2D bounds;
2188 Player *enemy = getAiEnemy();
2189 if (enemy) {
2190 getPlayerStructureBounds(&bounds, enemy->getPlayerIndex());
2191 enemyCenter.set( (bounds.lo.x+bounds.hi.x)*0.5f, (bounds.lo.y+bounds.hi.y)*0.5f, 0);
2192 }
2193
2194 do {
2195 for( obj = TheGameLogic->getFirstObject(); obj; obj = obj->getNextObject() )
2196 {
2197 if (!obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_STRUCTURE)) continue;
2198 if (!obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_SUPPLY_SOURCE)) continue;
2199 static const NameKeyType key_warehouseUpdate = NAMEKEY("SupplyWarehouseDockUpdate");
2200 SupplyWarehouseDockUpdate *warehouseModule = (SupplyWarehouseDockUpdate*)obj->findUpdateModule( key_warehouseUpdate );
2201 if( warehouseModule ) {
2202 Int availableCash = warehouseModule->getBoxesStored()*TheGlobalData->m_baseValuePerSupplyBox;
2203 if (availableCash<minimumCash) continue;
2204 if( m_player->getRelationship(obj->getTeam()) == ENEMIES ) {
2205 continue;
2206 }
2207
2208 // Make sure we don't have a supply center near it.
2209 Coord3D center = *obj->getPosition();
2210 Real radius = SUPPLY_CENTER_CLOSE_DIST + obj->getGeometryInfo().getBoundingCircleRadius();
2211
2212 PartitionFilterAcceptByKindOf f1(MAKE_KINDOF_MASK(KINDOF_CASH_GENERATOR), KINDOFMASK_NONE);
2213 PartitionFilterPlayer f2(m_player, true); // Only find your own units.
2214 PartitionFilterOnMap filterMapStatus;
2215
2216
2217 PartitionFilter *filters[] = { &f1, &f2, &filterMapStatus, 0 };
2218
2219 Object *supplyCenter = ThePartitionManager->getClosestObject(&center, radius, FROM_BOUNDINGSPHERE_2D, filters);
2220 if (supplyCenter) {
2221 // We already have a supply center.
2222 continue;
2223 }
2224
2225 Real dx, dy;
2226 dx = obj->getPosition()->x - m_baseCenter.x;
2227 dy = obj->getPosition()->y - m_baseCenter.y;
2228 Real distSqr = dx*dx + dy*dy;
2229 if (enemy) {
2230 // make sure this isn't closer to our enemy than us.
2231 dx = obj->getPosition()->x - enemyCenter.x;
2232 dy = obj->getPosition()->y - enemyCenter.y;
2233 if (distSqr*0.4>(dx*dx+dy*dy)*0.6f) {
2234 // closer than 60/40 to enemy than to us, probably not a good candidate for expansion.
2235 continue;
2236 }
2237 }
2238
2239 if (bestSupplyWarehouse==NULL) {
2240 bestSupplyWarehouse = obj;
2241 bestDistSqr = distSqr;
2242 } else if (bestDistSqr>distSqr) {
2243 bestSupplyWarehouse = obj;
2244 bestDistSqr = distSqr;
2245 }
2246 }
2247 }
2248 if (bestSupplyWarehouse) break;
2249 minimumCash /= 2;
2250 } while (minimumCash > 100);
2251
2252 return bestSupplyWarehouse;
2253}

2275// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2277// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2278void AIPlayer::repairStructure(ObjectID structure)
2279{
2280 Object *structureObj = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(structure);
2281 if (structureObj==NULL) return;
2282 if (structureObj->getBodyModule()==NULL) return;
2283 // If the structure is not noticably damaged, don't bother.
2284 enum BodyDamageType structureState = structureObj->getBodyModule()->getDamageState();
2285 if (structureState==BODY_PRISTINE) {
2286 return;
2287 }
2288 if (structureObj->isKindOf(KINDOF_BRIDGE)) {
2289 // Locate the correct post to repair.
2290 }
2291 Int i;
2292 for (i=0; i<m_structuresInQueue; i++) {
2293 if (m_structuresToRepair[i] == structureObj->getID()) {
2294 DEBUG_LOG(("info - Bridge already queued for repair.\n"));
2295 return;
2296 }
2297 }
2298 if (m_structuresInQueue==MAX_STRUCTURES_TO_REPAIR) {
2299 DEBUG_LOG(("Structure repair queue is full, ignoring repair request. JBA\n"));
2300 return;
2301 }
2302 m_structuresToRepair[m_structuresInQueue] = structureObj->getID();
2303 m_structuresInQueue++;
2304}

2313

2317// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2319// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2320void AIPlayer::updateBridgeRepair(void)
2321{
2322 if (m_structuresInQueue == 0) return;
2323 // Check once a second.
2324 m_bridgeTimer--;
2325 if (m_bridgeTimer>0) return;
2326 m_bridgeTimer = LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND;
2327 Object *bridgeObj=NULL;
2328 while (bridgeObj==NULL && m_structuresInQueue>0) {
2329 bridgeObj = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(m_structuresToRepair[0]);
2330 if (bridgeObj==NULL) {
2331 Int i;
2332 for (i=0; i<m_structuresInQueue-1; i++) {
2333 m_structuresToRepair[i] = m_structuresToRepair[i+1];
2334 }
2335 m_structuresInQueue--;
2336 }
2337 }
2338 if (m_structuresInQueue == 0) return;
2339
2340 // Got a bridge to repair.
2341 Object *dozer = NULL;
2342 Coord3D bridgePos = *bridgeObj->getPosition();
2343 enum BodyDamageType bridgeState = bridgeObj->getBodyModule()->getDamageState();
2344 if (m_repairDozer==INVALID_ID) {
2345 m_dozerIsRepairing = false;
2346 // Need a dozer.
2347 if (m_dozerQueuedForRepair) {
2348 return; // we're waiting for one.
2349 }
2350 dozer = findDozer(&bridgePos);
2351 if (dozer) {
2352 m_repairDozer = dozer->getID();
2353 m_repairDozerOrigin = *dozer->getPosition();
2354 dozer->getAI()->aiRepair(bridgeObj, CMD_FROM_AI);
2355 DEBUG_LOG(("Telling dozer to repair\n"));
2356 m_dozerIsRepairing = true;
2357 return;
2358 }
2359 queueDozer();
2360 m_dozerQueuedForRepair = true;
2361 return;
2362 }
2363
2364 dozer = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(m_repairDozer);
2365 if (dozer==NULL) {
2366 m_repairDozer=INVALID_ID; // we got killed.
2367 m_bridgeTimer=0;
2368 return; // Just try to find a dozer next frame.
2369 }
2370
2371 DozerAIInterface* dozerAI = dozer->getAI()->getDozerAIInterface();
2372 if (dozerAI==NULL) {
2373 DEBUG_CRASH(("Unexpected - dozer doesn't have dozer interface."));
2374 return;
2375 }
2376 if (m_dozerIsRepairing) {
2377 if (!dozerAI->isAnyTaskPending()) {
2378 // should be done repairing.
2379 if (bridgeState==BODY_PRISTINE) {
2380 DEBUG_LOG(("Dozer finished repairing structure.\n"));
2381 // we're done.
2382 Int i;
2383 for (i=0; i<m_structuresInQueue-1; i++) {
2384 m_structuresToRepair[i] = m_structuresToRepair[i+1];
2385 }
2386 m_structuresInQueue--;
2387 m_dozerIsRepairing = false;
2388 if (m_structuresInQueue==0) {
2389 // Go home.
2390 Coord3D pos = m_baseCenter;
2391 if (!m_baseCenterSet) {
2392 pos = m_repairDozerOrigin;
2393 }
2394 AIUpdateInterface *ai=dozer->getAI();
2395 TheAI->pathfinder()->adjustToPossibleDestination(dozer, ai->getLocomotorSet(), &pos);
2396 dozer->getAI()->aiMoveToPosition(&pos, CMD_FROM_AI);
2397 return;
2398 }
2399 }
2400 } else {
2401 // dozer should be working on the bridge.
2402 return;
2403 }
2404 }
2405 dozer->getAI()->aiRepair(bridgeObj, CMD_FROM_AI);
2406 m_dozerIsRepairing = true;
2407 DEBUG_LOG(("Telling dozer to repair\n"));
2408}
