2410// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2412// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2413void AIPlayer::buildSpecificAITeam( TeamPrototype *teamProto, Bool priorityBuild)
2414{
2415 //
2416 // Create "Team in queue" based on team population
2417 //
2418 if (teamProto)
2419 {
2420 if (!m_player->getCanBuildUnits()) {
2421 AsciiString teamStr = "Can't build team '";
2422 teamStr.concat(teamProto->getName());
2423 teamStr.concat("' because build units is disabled.");
2424 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
2425 return;
2426 }
2427 if (priorityBuild && teamProto->getIsSingleton()) {
2428 Team *singletonTeam = TheTeamFactory->findTeam( teamProto->getName() );
2429 if (singletonTeam && singletonTeam->hasAnyObjects()) {
2430 AsciiString teamStr = "Unable to build singleton team '";
2431 teamStr.concat("' because team already exists.");
2432 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
2433 return;
2434 }
2435 }
2436 // Check & make sure we have factories.
2437 Bool needMoney;
2438 if (!isPossibleToBuildTeam(teamProto, false, needMoney)) {
2439 if (needMoney) {
2440 // Queue it up anyway.
2441 AsciiString teamStr = "Note - queueing team '";
2442 teamStr.concat(teamProto->getName());
2443 teamStr.concat("' but there is enough money.");
2444 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
2445 } else {
2446 // Tech tree doesn't work.
2447 AsciiString teamStr = "Unable to build team '";
2448 teamStr.concat(teamProto->getName());
2449 if (needMoney) {
2450 teamStr.concat("' - Not enough money.");
2451 } else {
2452 teamStr.concat("' because required factories/tech don't exist.");
2453 }
2454 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
2455 return;
2456 }
2457 }
2458 const TCreateUnitsInfo *unitInfo = &teamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_unitsInfo[0];
2459 WorkOrder *orders = NULL;
2460 Int i;
2461 // Queue up optional units.
2462 for( i=0; i<teamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_numUnitsInfo; i++ )
2463 {
2464 const ThingTemplate *thing = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( unitInfo[i].unitThingName );
2465 if (thing)
2466 {
2467 int count = unitInfo[i].maxUnits-unitInfo[i].minUnits;
2468 if (count>0) {
2469 WorkOrder *order = newInstance(WorkOrder);
2470 order->m_thing = thing;
2471 order->m_factoryID = INVALID_ID;
2472 order->m_numRequired = count;
2473 // prepend to head of list
2474 order->m_next = orders;
2475 orders = order;
2476 }
2477 }
2478 }
2479 // Queue up required units.
2480 for( i=0; i<teamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_numUnitsInfo; i++ )
2481 {
2482 const ThingTemplate *thing = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( unitInfo[i].unitThingName );
2483 if (thing)
2484 {
2485 int count = unitInfo[i].minUnits;
2486 WorkOrder *order = newInstance(WorkOrder);
2487 order->m_thing = thing;
2488 order->m_factoryID = INVALID_ID;
2489 order->m_numRequired = count;
2490 order->m_required = true;
2491 // prepend to head of list
2492 order->m_next = orders;
2493 orders = order;
2494 }
2495 }
2496 if (orders)
2497 {
2498 /* We have something to build. */
2499 TeamInQueue *team = newInstance(TeamInQueue);
2500 if (priorityBuild) {
2501 // Put in front of queue.
2502 prependTo_TeamBuildQueue(team);
2503 team->m_priorityBuild = true;
2504 } else {
2505 // Put in back of queue.
2506 reverse_TeamBuildQueue();
2507 prependTo_TeamBuildQueue(team);
2508 reverse_TeamBuildQueue();
2509 team->m_priorityBuild = false;
2510 }
2511 team->m_workOrders = orders;
2512 team->m_frameStarted = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
2513 // create inactive team to place members into as they are built
2514 // when team is complete, the team is activated
2515 team->m_team = TheTeamFactory->createInactiveTeam( teamProto->getName() );
2516 AsciiString teamName = teamProto->getName();
2517 teamName.concat(" - starting team build.");
2518 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, false);
2519 m_teamDelay = 0;
2520 if (team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_executeActions) {
2521 const Script *script = TheScriptEngine->findScriptByName(team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_productionCondition);
2522 if (script && script->getAction()) {
2523 TheScriptEngine->friend_executeAction(script->getAction(), team->m_team);
2524 }
2525 }
2526 } else {
2527 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugAI) {
2528 AsciiString teamName = teamProto->getName();
2529 teamName.concat(" - contains 0 buildable units.");
2530 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, false);
2531 }
2532 }
2533
2534 }
2535}
2536
2537// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2539// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2540void AIPlayer::recruitSpecificAITeam(TeamPrototype *teamProto, Real recruitRadius)
2541{
2542 if (recruitRadius < 1) recruitRadius = 99999.0f;
2543 //
2544 // Create "Team in queue" based on team population
2545 //
2546 if (teamProto)
2547 {
2548 if (teamProto->getIsSingleton()) {
2549 Team *singletonTeam = TheTeamFactory->findTeam( teamProto->getName() );
2550 if (singletonTeam && singletonTeam->hasAnyObjects()) {
2551 AsciiString teamStr = "Unable to recruit singleton team '";
2552 teamStr.concat("' because team already exists.");
2553 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
2554 return;
2555 }
2556 }
2557 if (!teamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_hasHomeLocation && !isSkirmishAI())
2558 {
2559 AsciiString teamStr = "Error : team '";
2560 teamStr.concat(teamProto->getName());
2561 teamStr.concat("' has no Home Position (or Origin).");
2562 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
2563 }
2564 // create inactive team to place members into as they are built
2565 // when team is complete, the team is activated
2566 Team *theTeam = TheTeamFactory->createInactiveTeam( teamProto->getName() );
2567 AsciiString teamName = teamProto->getName();
2568 teamName.concat(" - Recruiting.");
2569 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, false);
2570 const TCreateUnitsInfo *unitInfo = &teamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_unitsInfo[0];
2571// WorkOrder *orders = NULL;
2572 Int i;
2573 Int unitsRecruited = 0;
2574 // Recruit.
2575 for( i=0; i<teamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_numUnitsInfo; i++ )
2576 {
2577 const ThingTemplate *thing = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( unitInfo[i].unitThingName );
2578 if (thing)
2579 {
2580 int count = unitInfo[i].maxUnits;
2581 while (count>0) {
2582 Object *unit = theTeam->tryToRecruit(thing, &teamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_homeLocation, recruitRadius);
2583 if (unit)
2584 {
2585 unitsRecruited++;
2586
2587 AsciiString teamStr = "Team '";
2588 teamStr.concat(theTeam->getPrototype()->getName());
2589 teamStr.concat("' recruits ");
2590 teamStr.concat(thing->getName());
2591 teamStr.concat(" from team '");
2592 teamStr.concat(unit->getTeam()->getPrototype()->getName());
2593 teamStr.concat("'");
2594 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
2595
2596 unit->setTeam(theTeam);
2597
2598 AIUpdateInterface *ai = unit->getAIUpdateInterface();
2599 if (ai)
2600 {
2601#if defined(_DEBUG) || defined(_INTERNAL)
2602 Coord3D pos = *unit->getPosition();
2603 Coord3D to = teamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_homeLocation;
2604 DEBUG_LOG(("Moving unit from %f,%f to %f,%f\n", pos.x, pos.y , to.x, to.y ));
2605#endif
2606 ai->aiMoveToPosition( &teamProto->getTemplateInfo()->m_homeLocation, CMD_FROM_AI);
2607 }
2608 } else {
2609 break;
2610 }
2611 count--;
2612 }
2613 }
2614 }
2615 if (unitsRecruited>0)
2616 {
2617 /* We have something to build. */
2618 TeamInQueue *team = newInstance(TeamInQueue);
2619 // Put in front of queue.
2620 prependTo_TeamReadyQueue(team);
2621 team->m_priorityBuild = false;
2622 team->m_workOrders = NULL;
2623 team->m_frameStarted = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
2624 team->m_team = theTeam;
2625 AsciiString teamName = teamProto->getName();
2626 teamName.concat(" - Finished recruiting.");
2627 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, false);
2628 } else {
2629 //disband.
2630 if (!theTeam->getPrototype()->getIsSingleton()) {
2631 theTeam->deleteInstance();
2632 theTeam = NULL;
2633 }
2634 AsciiString teamName = teamProto->getName();
2635 teamName.concat(" - Recruited 0 units, disbanding.");
2636 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, false);
2637 }
2638 }
2639}

2643// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2645{
2646 // select a new team
2647 if (selectTeamToBuild()) {
2648 queueUnits();
2649 }
2650}

2652// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2653// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2654void AIPlayer::queueUnits( void )
2655{
2656
2657 queueSupplyTruck();
2658
2659 // For each member of the current team to build, try to find a faction building to build it.
2660 //
2661 for ( DLINK_ITERATOR<TeamInQueue> iter = iterate_TeamBuildQueue(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
2662 {
2663 TeamInQueue *team = iter.cur();
2664 for( WorkOrder *order = team->m_workOrders; order; order = order->m_next )
2665 {
2666 // check if there is a unit on the map that we can steal (recruit) instead of building
2667 // @todo: Should this try to alter the home location of the recruiting area to
2668 // the center of the team, or to the home area of this player?
2669 Coord3D home = team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_homeLocation;
2670 Bool hasHome = false;
2671 if (team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_hasHomeLocation) {
2672 hasHome = true;
2673 } else {
2674 hasHome = getBaseCenter(&home);
2675 }
2676 while (order->isWaitingToBuild()) {
2677
2678 Object *unit = team->m_team->tryToRecruit(order->m_thing, &home, TheAI->getAiData()->m_maxRecruitDistance);
2679 if (unit)
2680 {
2681 order->m_numCompleted++;
2682
2683 AsciiString teamStr = "Team '";
2684 teamStr.concat(team->m_team->getPrototype()->getName());
2685 teamStr.concat("' recruits ");
2686 teamStr.concat(order->m_thing->getName());
2687 teamStr.concat(" from team '");
2688 teamStr.concat(unit->getTeam()->getPrototype()->getName());
2689 teamStr.concat("'");
2690 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamStr, false);
2691
2692 unit->setTeam(team->m_team);
2693
2694 AIUpdateInterface *ai = unit->getAIUpdateInterface();
2695 if (hasHome) {
2696 ai->aiMoveToPosition( &home, CMD_FROM_AI);
2697 } else {
2698 ai->aiIdle(CMD_FROM_AI); // stop, you've been recruited.
2699 }
2700 } else {
2701 break;
2702 }
2703 }
2704 if (order->isWaitingToBuild())
2705 {
2706
2707 // start the creation of a new unit
2708 startTraining( order, team->m_priorityBuild, team->m_team->getName());
2709 }
2710 else
2711 {
2712 // we are under construction, verify our factory still exists
2713 order->validateFactory(m_player);
2714 }
2715 }
2716 }
2717}

2719//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2723void AIPlayer::doBaseBuilding( void )
2724{
2725 if (m_player->getCanBuildBase()) {
2726 // See if we are ready to start trying a structure.
2727 if (!m_readyToBuildStructure) {
2728 m_structureTimer--;
2729 if (m_structureTimer<=0) {
2730 m_readyToBuildStructure = true;
2731 m_buildDelay = 0;
2732 }
2733 }
2734 // This timer is to keep from banging on the logic each frame. If something interesting
2735 // happens, like a building is added or a unit finished, the timers are shortcut.
2736 m_buildDelay--;
2737 if (m_buildDelay<1) {
2738 if (m_readyToBuildStructure) {
2739 processBaseBuilding();
2740 }
2741 if (m_buildDelay<1) { // processBaseBuilding may reset m_buildDelay.
2742 m_buildDelay = 2*LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND; // check again in 2 seconds.
2743 }
2744 // Note that this timer gets shortcut when a building is completed.
2745 }
2746 }
2747}

2749//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2753void AIPlayer::checkReadyTeams( void )
2754{
2755 // See if any ready teams are gathered at their rally point
2756 { // needed to scope iter. silly ms c++.
2757 for ( DLINK_ITERATOR<TeamInQueue> iter = iterate_TeamReadyQueue(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
2758 {
2759 TeamInQueue *team = iter.cur();
2760 // If 60 seconds passed, start anyway.
2761 Bool timeExpired = team->m_frameStarted+60*LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND < TheGameLogic->getFrame();
2762 Bool allIdle=TRUE;
2763 Bool anyIdle = FALSE;
2764 if (team->m_reinforcement) {
2765 Object *obj = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(team->m_reinforcementID);
2766 if (obj && obj->getAIUpdateInterface()) {
2767 allIdle = obj->getAIUpdateInterface()->isIdle();
2768 anyIdle = allIdle;
2769 }
2770 } else {
2771 allIdle = team->m_team->isIdle();
2772 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->m_team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
2773 Object *obj = iter.cur();
2774 if (obj->getAI() && obj->getAI()->isIdle()) {
2775 anyIdle = true;
2776 }
2777 }
2778 }
2779 if (anyIdle && team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_executeActions) {
2780 const Script *script = TheScriptEngine->findScriptByName(team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_productionCondition);
2781 if (script && script->getAction()) {
2782 // we have a start action. So don't wait for allIdle as the team may be guarding.
2783 allIdle = true;
2784 }
2785 }
2786 if (timeExpired) allIdle = true;
2787 if (allIdle) {
2788 if (!team->m_sentToStartLocation) {
2789 team->m_sentToStartLocation = true;
2790 /*
2791 if (team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_hasHomeLocation &&
2792 !team->m_reinforcement) {
2793 AIGroup* theGroup = TheAI->createGroup();
2794 if (theGroup) {
2795 team->m_team->getTeamAsAIGroup(theGroup);
2796 Coord3D destination = team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_homeLocation;
2797 theGroup->groupTightenToPosition( &destination, false, CMD_FROM_AI );
2798 team->m_frameStarted = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
2799 continue;
2800 }
2801 }
2802 */
2803 }
2804 // Start the team up.
2805 removeFrom_TeamReadyQueue(team);
2806 if (team->m_reinforcement) {
2807 Object *obj = TheGameLogic->findObjectByID(team->m_reinforcementID);
2808 if (obj&&obj->getAIUpdateInterface()) {
2809 obj->getAIUpdateInterface()->joinTeam();
2810 }
2811 } else {
2812 // mark our completed team as "active" - this will invoke any OnCreate scripts, etc.
2813 team->m_team->setActive();
2814 if (isSkirmishAI()) {
2815 TheScriptEngine->clearTeamFlags();
2816 }
2817 if (TheGlobalData->m_debugAI) {
2818 AsciiString teamName = team->m_team->getPrototype()->getName();
2819 teamName.concat(" - team activated.");
2820 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, false);
2821 }
2822 }
2823 team->deleteInstance();
2824 iter = iterate_TeamReadyQueue();
2825 }
2826 }
2827 }
2828}

2830//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2834void AIPlayer::checkQueuedTeams( void )
2835{
2836 // See if any teams are expired.
2837 { // needed to scope iter. silly ms c++.
2838 for ( DLINK_ITERATOR<TeamInQueue> iter = iterate_TeamBuildQueue(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
2839 {
2840 TeamInQueue *team = iter.cur();
2841 if (team && team->isBuildTimeExpired()) {
2842 if (team->isMinimumBuilt())
2843 {
2844 if (team->areBuildsComplete()) {
2845 // Move to ready queue
2846 removeFrom_TeamBuildQueue(team);
2847 prependTo_TeamReadyQueue(team);
2848 } else {
2849 continue;
2850 }
2851 } else {
2852 // Disband.
2853 removeFrom_TeamBuildQueue(team);
2854 team->disband();
2855 team->deleteInstance();
2856 if (isSkirmishAI()) {
2857 TheScriptEngine->clearTeamFlags();
2858 }
2859 }
2860 iter = iterate_TeamBuildQueue();
2861 }
2862 }
2863 }
2864
2865 // See if any teams are ready.
2866 { // needed to scope iter. silly ms c++.
2867 for ( DLINK_ITERATOR<TeamInQueue> iter = iterate_TeamBuildQueue(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
2868 {
2869 TeamInQueue *team = iter.cur();
2870 if (team && team->isAllBuilt())
2871 {
2872 // Move to ready queue
2873 removeFrom_TeamBuildQueue(team);
2874 prependTo_TeamReadyQueue(team);
2875 iter = iterate_TeamBuildQueue();
2876 continue;
2877 }
2878 Bool anyIdle = false;
2879 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->m_team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance()) {
2880 Object *obj = iter.cur();
2881 if (obj && obj->getAI() && obj->getAI()->isIdle()) {
2882 anyIdle = true;
2883 }
2884 }
2885 if (anyIdle) {
2886 if (team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_executeActions) {
2887 const Script *script = TheScriptEngine->findScriptByName(team->m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_productionCondition);
2888 if (script) {
2889 TheScriptEngine->friend_executeAction(script->getAction(), team->m_team);
2890 }
2891 }
2892 }
2893 }
2894 }
2895}

2897//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2901void AIPlayer::doTeamBuilding( void )
2902{
2903 // See if any teams are expired.
2904 if (m_player->getCanBuildUnits()) {
2905 // See if we are ready to start trying a team.
2906 if (!m_readyToBuildTeam) {
2907 m_teamTimer--;
2908 if (m_teamTimer<=0) {
2909 m_readyToBuildTeam = true;
2910 m_teamDelay = 0;
2911 }
2912 }
2913
2914 // This timer is to keep from banging on the logic each frame. If something interesting
2915 // happens, like a building is added or a unit finished, the timers are shortcut.
2916 m_teamDelay--;
2917 if (m_teamDelay<1) {
2918 queueUnits(); // update the queues.
2919 if (m_readyToBuildTeam) {
2920 processTeamBuilding();
2921 }
2922 m_teamDelay = 5*LOGICFRAMES_PER_SECOND; // check again in 5 seconds.
2923 // Note that this timer gets shortcut when a unit or building is completed.
2924 }
2925 }
2926}

2928//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2932void AIPlayer::doUpgradesAndSkills( void )
2933{
2934 if (TheGameLogic->getFrame() < 2) {
2935 // can't do updates on the first few frames
2936 return;
2937 }
2938
2939 Bool checkScience = m_player->getSciencePurchasePoints()>0;
2940 if (!checkScience) {
2941 return;
2942 }
2943 const AISideInfo *sideInfo = TheAI->getAiData()->m_sideInfo;
2944 while (sideInfo) {
2945 if (sideInfo->m_side == m_player->getSide()) {
2946 break;
2947 }
2948 sideInfo = sideInfo->m_next;
2949 }
2950 if (sideInfo == NULL) return;
2951
2952 if (m_skillsetSelector == INVALID_SKILLSET_SELECTION) {
2953 Int limit = 0;
2954 // Pick randomly among the skillsets that have skills.
2955 // Designers sometimes only define skillset 1 & 2, or some such. jba.
2956 if (sideInfo->m_skillSet2.m_numSkills>0) {
2957 limit = 1;
2958 if (sideInfo->m_skillSet3.m_numSkills>0) {
2959 limit = 2;
2960 if (sideInfo->m_skillSet4.m_numSkills>0) {
2961 limit = 3;
2962 if (sideInfo->m_skillSet5.m_numSkills>0) {
2963 limit = 4;
2964 }
2965 }
2966 }
2967 }
2968 if (isSkirmishAI()) {
2969 m_skillsetSelector = GameLogicRandomValue(0, limit);
2970 } else {
2971 m_skillsetSelector = 0; // Non-skirmish default to 0. jba.
2972 }
2973 }
2974
2975 // SKILLS
2976 if (m_player->getSciencePurchasePoints()>0) {
2977 const TSkillSet *skillset;
2978 switch(m_skillsetSelector) {
2979 default:
2980 case 0: skillset = &sideInfo->m_skillSet1; break;
2981 case 1: skillset = &sideInfo->m_skillSet2; break;
2982 case 2: skillset = &sideInfo->m_skillSet3; break;
2983 case 3: skillset = &sideInfo->m_skillSet4; break;
2984 case 4: skillset = &sideInfo->m_skillSet5; break;
2985 }
2986 Int i;
2987 for (i=0; i<skillset->m_numSkills; i++) {
2988 ScienceType science = skillset->m_skills[i];
2989 if (m_player->isCapableOfPurchasingScience(science)) {
2990 if (m_player->attemptToPurchaseScience(science)) {
2991 AsciiString msg = TheNameKeyGenerator->keyToName(m_player->getPlayerNameKey());
2992 msg.concat(" purchases from SkillSet");
2993 msg.concat('1'+m_skillsetSelector);
2994 msg.concat(' ');
2995 msg.concat(TheScienceStore->getInternalNameForScience(science));
2996 msg.concat(".");
2997 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage( msg, false);
2998 }
2999 }
3000 }
3001 }
3002
3003
3004}

3010//DECLARE_PERF_TIMER(AIPlayer_update)
3011void AIPlayer::update( void )
3012{
3013 //USE_PERF_TIMER(AIPlayer_update)
3014
3015 doBaseBuilding(); // See if it's time to build another building.
3016
3017 checkReadyTeams(); // See if any teams are ready to start.
3018
3019 checkQueuedTeams(); // See if any teams are complete.
3020
3021 doTeamBuilding(); // See if it's time to start another team.
3022
3023 doUpgradesAndSkills(); // See if it's time to build an upgrade or buy a skill.
3024
3025 updateBridgeRepair(); // Handle any bridge repairs.
3026
3027}

3029//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3034void AIPlayer::newMap( void )
3035{
3036 BuildListInfo *info = m_player->getBuildList();
3037 // Add any factories placed to the build list.
3038 Object *obj;
3039 for( obj = TheGameLogic->getFirstObject(); obj; obj = obj->getNextObject() )
3040 {
3041
3042 Player *owner = obj->getControllingPlayer();
3043 if (owner==m_player) {
3044 // See if it's a factory.
3045 ProductionUpdateInterface *pu = obj->getProductionUpdateInterface();
3046 // If it doesn't produce, continue.
3047 if (!pu) continue;
3048 m_player->addToBuildList(obj);
3049 }
3050
3051 }
3052 computeCenterAndRadiusOfBase(&m_baseCenter, &m_baseRadius);
3053
3054 // Build any with the initially built flag.
3055 for( /* nothing */; info; info = info->getNext() )
3056 {
3057 AsciiString name = info->getTemplateName();
3058 if (name.isEmpty()) continue;
3059 const ThingTemplate *bldgPlan = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( name );
3060 if (!bldgPlan) {
3061 DEBUG_LOG(("*** ERROR - Build list building '%s' doesn't exist.\n", name.str()));
3062 continue;
3063 }
3064 if (info->isInitiallyBuilt()) {
3065 buildStructureNow(bldgPlan, info);
3066 } else {
3067 info->incrementNumRebuilds(); // the initial build in the normal build list consumes a rebuild, so add one.
3068 }
3069 }
3070}
3071
3072// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3074// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3075void AIPlayer::computeCenterAndRadiusOfBase(Coord3D *center, Real *radius)
3076{
3077 //
3078 BuildListInfo *info;
3079 Coord2D totalPos;
3080 totalPos.x = 0;
3081 totalPos.y = 0;
3082 Int numBldg=0;
3083 for( info = m_player->getBuildList(); info; info = info->getNext() )
3084 {
3085 AsciiString name = info->getTemplateName();
3086 if (name.isEmpty()) continue;
3087 const ThingTemplate *bldgPlan = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( name );
3088 if (!bldgPlan) {
3089 continue;
3090 }
3091 Coord3D pos = *info->getLocation();
3092 totalPos.x += pos.x;
3093 totalPos.y += pos.y;
3094 numBldg++;
3095 }
3096 if (numBldg>0) {
3097 totalPos.x /= numBldg;
3098 totalPos.y /= numBldg;
3099 }
3100
3101 m_baseCenterSet = numBldg>0;
3102 center->x = totalPos.x;
3103 center->y = totalPos.y;
3104
3105 Real maxRadSqr = 0;
3106 //
3107 for( info = m_player->getBuildList(); info; info = info->getNext() )
3108 {
3109 AsciiString name = info->getTemplateName();
3110 if (name.isEmpty()) continue;
3111 const ThingTemplate *bldgPlan = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( name );
3112 if (!bldgPlan) {
3113 continue;
3114 }
3115 Coord3D pos = *info->getLocation();
3116 Real dx = pos.x-center->x;
3117 Real dy = pos.y-center->y;
3118 if (dx<0) dx = -dx;
3119 if (dy<0) dy = -dy;
3120 Real bldgRadius = bldgPlan->getTemplateGeometryInfo().getBoundingCircleRadius()*0.4f;
3121 dx += bldgRadius;
3122 dy += bldgRadius;
3123 Real radSqr = dx*dx+dy*dy;
3124 if (radSqr>maxRadSqr) maxRadSqr=radSqr;
3125 }
3126 *radius = sqrt(maxRadSqr);
3127}

3148//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3152void AIPlayer::queueDozer( void )
3153{
3154
3155 if (dozerInQueue()) return;
3156 // Find a factory that can build a dozer.
3157
3158 Bool canBuildUnits = m_player->getCanBuildUnits();
3159 // If we need a dozer, turn on unit building for a moment.
3160 m_player->setCanBuildUnits(true);
3161 const ThingTemplate *tTemplate = TheThingFactory->firstTemplate();
3162 while (tTemplate) {
3163 if (tTemplate->isKindOf(KINDOF_DOZER)) {
3164 Object *factory = findFactory(tTemplate, true);
3165 if (factory) {
3166 // we can build one.
3167 WorkOrder *order = newInstance(WorkOrder);
3168 order->m_thing = tTemplate;
3169 order->m_factoryID = INVALID_ID;
3170 order->m_numRequired = 1;
3171 order->m_required = true;
3172 order->m_isResourceGatherer = FALSE;
3173 // prepend to head of list
3174 order->m_next = NULL;
3175 TeamInQueue *team = newInstance(TeamInQueue);
3176 // Put in front of queue.
3177 prependTo_TeamBuildQueue(team);
3178 team->m_priorityBuild = true;
3179 team->m_workOrders = order;
3180 team->m_frameStarted = TheGameLogic->getFrame();
3181 // Stick it on the default team
3182 team->m_team = m_player->getDefaultTeam();
3183 AsciiString teamName = "DOZER - building one at the ";
3184 teamName.concat(factory->getTemplate()->getName());
3185 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, false);
3186 m_teamDelay = 0;
3187 startTraining( order, team->m_priorityBuild, team->m_team->getName());
3188 break;
3189 }
3190 }
3191 tTemplate = tTemplate->friend_getNextTemplate();
3192 }
3193 // restore canbuildunits.
3194 m_player->setCanBuildUnits(canBuildUnits);
3195}

3207//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3211Object * AIPlayer::findDozer( const Coord3D *pos )
3212{
3213 // Add any factories placed to the build list.
3214 Object *obj;
3215 Object *dozer = NULL;
3216 Bool needDozer = true;
3217 Object *closestDozer=NULL;
3218 Real closestDistSqr = 0;
3219
3220 for( obj = TheGameLogic->getFirstObject(); obj; obj = obj->getNextObject() )
3221 {
3222
3223 Player *owner = obj->getControllingPlayer();
3224 if (owner==m_player) {
3225 // See if it's a dozer.
3226 if (obj->isKindOf(KINDOF_DOZER)) {
3227
3228 AIUpdateInterface *ai = obj->getAIUpdateInterface();
3229 if (ai==NULL) {
3230 continue;
3231 }
3232
3233
3234 DozerAIInterface* dozerAI = ai->getDozerAIInterface();
3235 if (dozerAI) {
3236 // Since workers can be dozers, hmmm....
3237 SupplyTruckAIInterface* supplyTruckAI = ai->getSupplyTruckAIInterface();
3238 if( !dozerAI->isAnyTaskPending() && supplyTruckAI ) {
3239 // If it is gathering supplies, don't steal it.
3240 if (supplyTruckAI->isCurrentlyFerryingSupplies() || supplyTruckAI->isForcedIntoWantingState())
3241 {
3242 continue;
3243 }
3244 }
3245 if (obj->getID() == m_repairDozer) {
3246 continue; // don't steal the repair dozer.
3247 }
3248 needDozer = false; // dozer exists, may be busy.
3249 if (dozerAI->isTaskPending(DOZER_TASK_BUILD)) {
3250 continue; // already building.
3251 }
3252 if (!dozerAI->isAnyTaskPending()) {
3253 dozer = obj; // prefer an idle dozer
3254 }
3255 if (dozer==NULL) {
3256 dozer = obj; // but we'll take one doing stuff.
3257 }
3258 if (dozer && !dozerAI->isAnyTaskPending()) {
3259 // Got a good one, track closest.
3260 Real distSqr;
3261 Real dx, dy;
3262 dx = pos->x - dozer->getPosition()->x;
3263 dy = pos->y - dozer->getPosition()->y;
3264 distSqr = dx*dx+dy*dy;
3265 if (closestDozer == NULL) {
3266 closestDozer = dozer;
3267 closestDistSqr = distSqr;
3268 } else if (distSqr < closestDistSqr) {
3269 closestDozer = dozer;
3270 closestDistSqr = distSqr;
3271 }
3272 }
3273 }
3274 }
3275 }
3276
3277 }
3278 if (needDozer) {
3279 queueDozer();
3280 }
3281 if (closestDozer) return closestDozer;
3282 return dozer;
3283}

3293// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3301// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3302void AIPlayer::xfer( Xfer *xfer )
3303{
3304
3305 // version
3306 XferVersion currentVersion = 1;
3307 XferVersion version = currentVersion;
3308 xfer->xferVersion( &version, currentVersion );
3309
3310 // team build queue count
3311 UnsignedShort teamBuildQueueCount = 0;
3312 for( DLINK_ITERATOR< TeamInQueue > teamInQueueIt = iterate_TeamBuildQueue();
3313 teamInQueueIt.done() == FALSE;
3314 teamInQueueIt.advance() )
3315 teamBuildQueueCount++;
3316 xfer->xferUnsignedShort( &teamBuildQueueCount );
3317
3318 // team build queue data
3319 TeamInQueue *teamInQueue;
3320 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
3321 {
3322
3323 for( DLINK_ITERATOR< TeamInQueue > teamInQueueIt = iterate_TeamBuildQueue();
3324 teamInQueueIt.done() == FALSE;
3325 teamInQueueIt.advance() )
3326 {
3327
3328 // get element data
3329 teamInQueue = teamInQueueIt.cur();
3330
3331 // xfer it
3332 xfer->xferSnapshot( teamInQueue );
3333
3334 } // end for, iterate team build queue
3335
3336 } // end if, save
3337 else
3338 {
3339
3340 // sanity, the list must be empty
3341 if( getFirstItemIn_TeamBuildQueue() != NULL )
3342 {
3343
3344 DEBUG_CRASH(( "AIPlayer::xfer - TeamBuildQueue head is not NULL, you should delete it or something before loading a new list\n" ));
3345 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
3346
3347 } // end if
3348
3349 // ready all data
3350 for( UnsignedShort i = 0; i < teamBuildQueueCount; ++i )
3351 {
3352
3353 // allocate new team in queue instance
3354 teamInQueue = newInstance(TeamInQueue);
3355
3356 // attach to end of list
3357 prependTo_TeamBuildQueue( teamInQueue );
3358
3359 // xfer data
3360 xfer->xferSnapshot( teamInQueue );
3361
3362 } // end for, i
3363
3364 // the list was loaded in reverse order, reverse the list so it's in the same order as before
3365 reverse_TeamBuildQueue();
3366
3367 } // end else, load
3368
3369 // team ready queue count
3370 UnsignedShort teamReadyQueueCount = 0;
3371 for( DLINK_ITERATOR< TeamInQueue > teamReadyQueueIt = iterate_TeamReadyQueue();
3372 teamReadyQueueIt.done() == FALSE;
3373 teamReadyQueueIt.advance() )
3374 teamReadyQueueCount++;
3375 xfer->xferUnsignedShort( &teamReadyQueueCount );
3376
3377 // team Ready queue data
3378 TeamInQueue *teamReadyQueue;
3379 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
3380 {
3381
3382 for( DLINK_ITERATOR< TeamInQueue > teamReadyQueueIt = iterate_TeamReadyQueue();
3383 teamReadyQueueIt.done() == FALSE;
3384 teamReadyQueueIt.advance() )
3385 {
3386
3387 // get element
3388 teamReadyQueue = teamReadyQueueIt.cur();
3389
3390 // xfer data
3391 xfer->xferSnapshot( teamReadyQueue );
3392
3393 } // end for, iterate team ready queue
3394
3395 } // end if, save
3396 else
3397 {
3398
3399 // sanity, the list must be empty
3400 if( getFirstItemIn_TeamReadyQueue() != NULL )
3401 {
3402
3403 DEBUG_CRASH(( "AIPlayer::xfer - TeamReadyQueue head is not NULL, you should delete it or something before loading a new list\n" ));
3404 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
3405
3406 } // end if
3407
3408 // read all data
3409 for( UnsignedShort i = 0; i < teamReadyQueueCount; ++i )
3410 {
3411
3412 // allocate new team in queue instance
3413 teamInQueue = newInstance(TeamInQueue);
3414
3415 // attach to end of list
3416 prependTo_TeamReadyQueue( teamInQueue );
3417
3418 // xfer data
3419 xfer->xferSnapshot( teamInQueue );
3420
3421 } // end for, i
3422
3423 // reverse the list since it was loaded in reverse order due to the prepend
3424 reverse_TeamReadyQueue();
3425
3426 } // end else, load
3427
3428 // xfer player index ... this is really just for sanity
3429 PlayerIndex playerIndex = m_player->getPlayerIndex();
3430 xfer->xferUser( &playerIndex, sizeof( PlayerIndex ) );
3431 if( playerIndex != m_player->getPlayerIndex() )
3432 {
3433
3434 DEBUG_CRASH(( "AIPlayer::xfer - player index mismatch\n" ));
3435 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
3436
3437 } // end if
3438
3439 // xfer the rest of the ai player data (it's pretty straight forward)
3440 xfer->xferBool( &m_readyToBuildTeam );
3441 xfer->xferBool( &m_readyToBuildStructure );
3442 xfer->xferInt( &m_teamTimer );
3443 xfer->xferInt( &m_structureTimer );
3444
3445 xfer->xferInt( &m_buildDelay );
3446 xfer->xferInt( &m_teamDelay );
3447
3448 xfer->xferInt(&m_teamSeconds);
3449 xfer->xferObjectID(&m_curWarehouseID);
3450
3451 xfer->xferInt( &m_frameLastBuildingBuilt );
3452
3453 xfer->xferUser( &m_difficulty, sizeof( GameDifficulty ) );
3454 xfer->xferInt( &m_skillsetSelector );
3455
3456 xfer->xferCoord3D( &m_baseCenter );
3457 xfer->xferBool( &m_baseCenterSet );
3458 xfer->xferReal( &m_baseRadius );
3459
3460 xfer->xferUser( m_structuresToRepair, sizeof( ObjectID ) * MAX_STRUCTURES_TO_REPAIR );
3461 xfer->xferObjectID( &m_repairDozer );
3462 xfer->xferInt( &m_structuresInQueue );
3463 xfer->xferBool( &m_dozerQueuedForRepair );
3464 xfer->xferBool( &m_dozerIsRepairing );
3465 xfer->xferInt( &m_bridgeTimer );
3466
3467} // end xfer

3479TeamInQueue::~TeamInQueue()
3480{
3481 WorkOrder *order, *next;
3482
3483 for( order = m_workOrders; order; order = next )
3484 {
3485 next = order->m_next;
3486 order->deleteInstance();
3487 }
3488 // If we have a team, activate it. If it is empty, Team.cpp will remove empty active teams.
3489 if (m_team) m_team->setActive();
3490 m_workOrders = NULL;
3491}

3495Bool TeamInQueue::isAllBuilt()
3496{

3500 for( order = m_workOrders; order; order = order->m_next )
3501 {
3502 if (order->m_numRequired>order->m_numCompleted)
3503 {
3504 stillBuilding = true;
3505 }
3506 }
3507 return !stillBuilding;

3510// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

3512Bool TeamInQueue::isBuildTimeExpired()
3513{
3514 if (m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_initialIdleFrames<1) {
3515 return false; // Unlimited time.
3516 }
3517 if (TheGameLogic->getFrame() > m_frameStarted + m_team->getPrototype()->getTemplateInfo()->m_initialIdleFrames) {
3518 return true;
3519 }
3520 return false;
3521}
3522
3523// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3524// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3525Bool TeamInQueue::isMinimumBuilt()
3526{
3527 WorkOrder *order;
3528
3529 for( order = m_workOrders; order; order = order->m_next )
3530 {
3531 Int count = order->m_numCompleted;
3532 if (order->m_factoryID != INVALID_ID) {
3533 count++; // we have one building.
3534 }
3535 if (order->m_numRequired>count)
3536 {
3537 if (order->m_required) {
3538 return false; // required units not built.
3539 }
3540 }
3541 }
3542 return true;
3543}
3544
3545// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3546// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3547Bool TeamInQueue::includesADozer()
3548{
3549 WorkOrder *order;
3550
3551 for( order = m_workOrders; order; order = order->m_next )
3552 {
3553 // GLA dozers (workers) are also resource gatherers, so make sure it isn't a gatherer. jba.
3554 if (order->m_thing->isKindOf(KINDOF_DOZER) && !order->m_isResourceGatherer) {
3555 return true;
3556 }
3557 }
3558 return false;
3559}

3561// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

3563Bool TeamInQueue::areBuildsComplete()
3564{
3565 WorkOrder *order;
3566
3567 for( order = m_workOrders; order; order = order->m_next )
3568 {
3569 if (order->m_factoryID != INVALID_ID) {
3570 return false; // we have one building.
3571 }
3572 }
3573 return true;
3574}

3576// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

3578void TeamInQueue::disband()
3579{
3580 Team *newTeam = m_team->getPrototype()->getControllingPlayer()->getDefaultTeam();
3581 AsciiString teamName = m_team->getPrototype()->getName();
3582 teamName.concat(" - team disbanded, build time expired.");
3583 TheScriptEngine->AppendDebugMessage(teamName, false);
3584 if (m_team != newTeam) {
3585 m_team->transferUnitsTo(newTeam);
3586 if (!m_team->getPrototype()->getIsSingleton()) {
3587 m_team->deleteInstance();
3588 }
3589 m_team = NULL;
3590 }
3591}

3600
3601// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3605// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3606void TeamInQueue::xfer( Xfer *xfer )
3607{
3608
3609 // version
3610 XferVersion currentVersion = 1;
3611 XferVersion version = currentVersion;;
3612 xfer->xferVersion( &version, currentVersion );
3613
3614 // xfer work order count
3615 UnsignedShort workOrderCount = 0;
3616 WorkOrder *workOrder;
3617 for( workOrder = m_workOrders; workOrder; workOrder = workOrder->m_next )
3618 workOrderCount++;
3619 xfer->xferUnsignedShort( &workOrderCount );
3620
3621 // xfer work orders
3622 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_SAVE )
3623 {
3624
3625 // xfer each work order
3626 for( workOrder = m_workOrders; workOrder; workOrder = workOrder->m_next )
3627 {
3628
3629 // xfer work order data
3630 xfer->xferSnapshot( workOrder );
3631
3632 } // end for
3633
3634 } // end if, save
3635 else
3636 {
3637
3638 // sanity
3639 if( m_workOrders != NULL )
3640 {
3641
3642 DEBUG_CRASH(( "TeamInQueue::xfer - m_workOrders should be NULL but isn't. Perhaps you should blow it away before loading\n" ));
3643 throw SC_INVALID_DATA;
3644
3645 } // end if
3646
3647 // load all work orders
3648 for( UnsignedShort i = 0; i < workOrderCount; ++i )
3649 {
3650
3651 // allocate new work order
3652 workOrder = newInstance(WorkOrder);
3653
3654 // attach to list at the end
3655 workOrder->m_next = NULL;
3656 if( m_workOrders == NULL )
3657 m_workOrders = workOrder;
3658 else
3659 {
3660 WorkOrder *last = m_workOrders;
3661
3662 while( last->m_next != NULL )
3663 last = last->m_next;
3664
3665 last->m_next = workOrder;
3666
3667 } // end else
3668
3669 // load work order data
3670 xfer->xferSnapshot( workOrder );
3671
3672 } // end for, i
3673
3674 } // end else, load
3675
3676 // xfer the rest of the team in queue data
3677 xfer->xferBool( &m_priorityBuild );
3678 TeamID teamID = m_team ? m_team->getID() : TEAM_ID_INVALID;
3679 xfer->xferUser( &teamID, sizeof( TeamID ) );
3680 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_LOAD )
3681 m_team = TheTeamFactory->findTeamByID( teamID );
3682 xfer->xferInt( &m_frameStarted );
3683 xfer->xferBool( &m_sentToStartLocation );
3684 xfer->xferBool( &m_stopQueueing );
3685 xfer->xferBool( &m_reinforcement );
3686 xfer->xferObjectID( &m_reinforcementID );
3687
3688} // end xfer

3740// ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3741void WorkOrder::xfer( Xfer *xfer )
3742{
3743
3744 // version
3745 XferVersion currentVersion = 1;
3746 XferVersion version = currentVersion;
3747 xfer->xferVersion( &version, currentVersion );
3748
3749 // thing template
3750 AsciiString thingTemplateName = m_thing ? m_thing->getName() : AsciiString::TheEmptyString;
3751 xfer->xferAsciiString( &thingTemplateName );
3752 if( xfer->getXferMode() == XFER_LOAD )
3753 m_thing = TheThingFactory->findTemplate( thingTemplateName );
3754
3755 // factory id
3756 xfer->xferObjectID( &m_factoryID );
3757
3758 // num completed
3759 xfer->xferInt( &m_numCompleted );
3760
3761 // num required
3762 xfer->xferInt( &m_numRequired );
3763
3764 // is required
3765 xfer->xferBool( &m_required );
3766
3767 // is resource gatherer
3768 xfer->xferBool( &m_isResourceGatherer );
3769
3770} // end xfer

3781//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3785void AIPlayer::getPlayerStructureBounds( Region2D *bounds, Int playerNdx, Bool conservative )
3786{
3787 Player::PlayerTeamList::const_iterator it;
3788 Bool firstObject = true;
3789 Bool firstStructure = true;
3790 bounds->hi.x = bounds->lo.x = bounds->hi.y = bounds->lo.y = 0;
3791 Region2D objBounds;
3792 objBounds.hi.x = objBounds.lo.x = objBounds.hi.y = objBounds.lo.y = 0;
3793
3794 Player* pPlayer = ThePlayerList->getNthPlayer(playerNdx);
3795 if (pPlayer == NULL)
3796 return;
3797 for (it = pPlayer->getPlayerTeams()->begin(); it != pPlayer->getPlayerTeams()->end(); ++it)
3798 {
3799 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Team> iter = (*it)->iterate_TeamInstanceList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
3800 {
3801 Team *team = iter.cur();
3802 if (!team)
3803 continue;
3804 for (DLINK_ITERATOR<Object> iter = team->iterate_TeamMemberList(); !iter.done(); iter.advance())
3805 {
3806 Object *pObj = iter.cur();
3807 if (!pObj)
3808 continue;
3809 if( pObj->isKindOf(KINDOF_STRUCTURE) )
3810 {
3811 if( conservative && pObj->isKindOf( KINDOF_CONSERVATIVE_BUILDING ) )
3812 {
3813 //Kris - Aug 14, 2003
3814 //Conservative buildings (captured tech buildings, sneak attack buildings are rejected).
3815 //This was added so base boundaries aren't potentially most of the map. Because sneak
3816 //attack uses an inverse cost calculation by avoiding defended areas, we need to keep
3817 //things close to the enemy base.
3818 continue;
3819 }
3820
3821 Coord3D pos = *pObj->getPosition();
3822 if (firstObject) {
3823 objBounds.lo.x = objBounds.hi.x = pos.x;
3824 objBounds.lo.y = objBounds.hi.y = pos.y;
3825 firstObject = false;
3826 }
3827 else
3828 {
3829 if (objBounds.lo.x>pos.x) objBounds.lo.x = pos.x;
3830 if (objBounds.lo.y>pos.y) objBounds.lo.y = pos.y;
3831 if (objBounds.hi.x<pos.x) objBounds.hi.x = pos.x;
3832 if (objBounds.hi.y<pos.y) objBounds.hi.y = pos.y;
3833 }
3834 if (firstStructure)
3835 {
3836 bounds->lo.x = bounds->hi.x = pos.x;
3837 bounds->lo.y = bounds->hi.y = pos.y;
3838 firstStructure = false;
3839 }
3840 else
3841 {
3842 if (bounds->lo.x>pos.x) bounds->lo.x = pos.x;
3843 if (bounds->lo.y>pos.y) bounds->lo.y = pos.y;
3844 if (bounds->hi.x<pos.x) bounds->hi.x = pos.x;
3845 if (bounds->hi.y<pos.y) bounds->hi.y = pos.y;
3846 }
3847 }
3848 }
3849 }
3850 }
3851 if (!firstStructure) {
3852 // Player had no structures, so use unit bounds.
3853 *bounds = objBounds;
3854 }
3855}
